Beautiful 2 BR first floor apt, big living room with a built-in air conditioner, re-decorated eat-in kitchen with refrigerator, stove and lots of cabinet space. Both bedrooms have double closets and hardwood floors. There is one assigned parking space included, shared porches and a storage locker and laundry in the basement. Close to Wauwatosa, major bus lines and easy access to downtown. Building has a history of good long-term tenants. Security deposit is $725. Available between Nov. 15 and Dec. 1st. Pictures are not the actual apt that will be available but are very similar to it. The biggest difference is the color of the appliances, instead of white, the stove is black and the refrigerator is stainless steel.

During the worst of COVID-19, I started doing pre-screening and private showings to limit everyone's exposure to it. I found this approach to be more effective and efficient than my old method of having an "open house" so I have decided to continue it even though COVID-19 is less of and issue than it was then. If you are reading this ad, the apt is still available.
Please reply by email if you have more questions or are interested in providing the information I need to pre-screen. If you prefer to discuss the apt by phone you can call Jerry at 262-789-86twotwo, however, all pre-screen info needs to be given via email.

Info needed for pre-screen (you can copy this, hit "reply" above the ad title, then paste and fill it out in your email reply, please provide the info for each adult who will be residing at apt):

-Full name and birth date of each adult who will be residing at apt ________________________
-Name(s) and age(s) of child(ren) that will be living with you____________________________
-Current address________________________How long?_________Your phone #_____________
-Landlord name and contact info_________________________________________
-Current Employer_______________Starting date_______Gross Monthly Income______
Employer Address and Phone #___________________________ Job Title____________
-Additional Monthly income and source___________________________________

After doing the pre-screening I will contact the applicants who are likely to be approved to schedule a private showing.

Some of the Qualifications:
*Must be 18 years or over
*Must have at least $2200/Mo in verifiable household gross income
*Bring Photo ID to showing, also having proof of income at that time will expedite an application
*Be able to get WE Energies in your name
*Able to pay FULL Security deposit within a day of application approval
*No evictions in past 10 yrs.

Property is owned by a WI Licensed Real Estate Broker

Spacious, interiors boast stainless steel appliances, wood-style flooring, and your own washer and dryer. A new fitness center features state-of-the-art fitness equipment, and a basketball and a tennis court mean you can stay active year round. Book an appointment and find out for yourself today.

Property Description
You feel it even before you see it. A sense of wonder: leafy trees and vast blue skies catch your eye, as if for the first time. A spirit of refreshment: genuine kindness from our helpful staff, and an atmosphere of calm throughout.You glance around, in awe of so much… space. Private entryways wind toward buildings which tower more like townhomes than the crammed apartments you’re used to. Interiors gleam with that “freshly done” feel: refinished kitchen cabinets; gray appliances; wood-look flooring, just the way you like. Tranquil as it is, it’s almost shocking that the freeways sit so close: M-5, I-275, I-696 and I-96 all within one mile for when your 9-5 beckons toward Troy, Detroit or Novi. As the weekend draws near, you can’t wait to stroll through downtown Farmington for live music and local fare. Welcome to Spring Valley Apartments: a breath of fresh air, and a place you’re proud to call home.

Fully Upgraded apartments available, with hard wood floors, granite counter tops, new cabinets, and stainless steel appliances! Rent prices ranging from $1500-$1695


Welcome to Southfield's best kept secret! Cranbrook Centre Apartments offers huge one- and two-bedroom apartments in Southfield, MI. Come take advantage of our amenities, which include a sparkling pool, business center, and expertly decorated clubhouse with comfortable seating areas and a kitchen with bar. We pride ourselves on being there for our residents and we offer on-site 24-hour maintenance, intercom entry, courteous on-site leasing team, concierge services, and laundry facilities.
Our pet-friendly apartments offer lovely upgraded interiors with redesigned kitchens that feature stylish tiled back splashes, dishwashers, refrigerators with freezers, and wood-inspired flooring. The living areas boast luxurious plush carpeting and custom lighting as well as large closets and air conditioners. You’ll also be able to enjoy plenty of fresh air with our patios and balconies.
Our community is located south of 13 Mile Road, minutes from Birmingham and Beverly Hills and steps from Beaumont Hospital Royal Oak and Wylie E. Groves High School. We are near great shopping, dining, entertainment, and recreational facilities. These include Somerset Collection, AMC Star Southfield 20, T.J. Maxx, and the array of options in downtown Detroit. We are sure you’ll love living here, so we invite you to give us a call and schedule your visit today! We can’t wait to show you all the ins and outs of our Southfield apartments.

 to text with us.President Madison Apartments This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 820 Sq. Ft.  BRAND NEW COMMUNITY CENTER featuring an expansive Social Gathering Room, fitness center with state-of-the-art fitness equipment and flat screen televisions and a beautifully designed outdoor pool. Our terrific location makes it easy for residents to walk or drive to some of the most entertaining parts of our city. Pop into Birmingham for the day, relax and enjoy some family time at Halmich Park or just take your dog on a walk to the nearby dog park. Anywhere you want to go is easily accessible and within just a few minutes drive from your front door.Inside our East Madison Heights apartments, residents are happy to find upgraded countertops and cabinets, name brand appliances, including gas stoves, individual heating and cooling systems and even ceramic and hardwood flooring and dishwashers in select homes.Our heated hallways and mail box areas will keep those cold MI winters at bay and modern conveniences like an on-site laundry facility, friendly management staff and online payments make living here a breeze.In addition to our spacious one and two bedroom floor plans, President Madison Apartments also offers temporary lease agreements for those visitors or business people who don’t want to spend all of their time in the confines of a hotel. Our well-appointed, furnished apartments provide a tranquil retreat when visiting Madison Heights. Features - Dishwashers available in select homes  - Well-designed floor plans ranging from 800 to 856 square feet  - Spacious closets  - Common laundry room with full size GE wash and dryer  - Gas Range in all apartment homes  - Brick buildings and traditional architecture  - Soft hued paint accented with white paneled doors  - Accent walls in living area of apartment home  - Updated lighting throughout the apartment home  - Carports available  - Beautifully designed kitchen featuring oak cabinetry, GE white appliances and dark walnut* vinyl plank flooring  - Large picture windows fitted with designer selected blinds  - Spacious living room and bedrooms featuring plush neutral carpet  - Satin nickel hardware throughout residence  - Resident Storage located on-site  - Secured entrance for each residence Community Amenities - On-line Resident Portal (see Resident Services tab)  - Easy highway access  - BRAND NEW!! Professionally equipped exercise room with flat screen television  - Free off-street parking  - On-site management  - Beautifully landscaped  - BRAND NEW!! Internet café with gourmet coffee bar  - BRAND NEW!! Expansive community center  - Pet friendly with well-designated pet area, close to city dog park  - 24-hour Maintenance Response Guarantee  - Reserved carports available to lease monthly based on availability  - On-site laundry  - Beautifully designed outdoor swimming pool  - Laundry in building Driving Directions From I-75N:Exit at 12 Mile Rd. and turn right.Turn left at John R Rd.Pass 13 Mille and you will see Sam's Club on your right.Turn right at the first street after Sam's Club (Irving).Turn left at the next main street, Harlo.President Madison Apartments is in the apartment building 31597 with a blue and white sign in front.From I-75S:Exit at 14 Mile Rd. and turn left.Turn right at John R Rd.Turn left at Whitcomb (7-11 and target).Turn right at the next main street, Harlo.President Madison Apartments is in the apartment building 31597 with a blue and white sign in front. Office Hours Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PMSaturday: 10:00AM-6:00PMPet Policy President Madison offers pet friendly apartments in Madison Heights and welcomes both cats in all apartments and dogs in select apartments. You'll find beautiful green spaces where your pet dog can run and play. In addition, your dog can run free and meet new friends at the nearby Red Oak Dog Park.We are one of the few communities in the area to welcome your large dog! We have a limit of 2 pets under 25 lbs each or one large pet without a weight limit. Some breed restrictions apply. We're confident your pet will love living at President Madison as much as our human neighbors do! ZZlwB32gKx

Text2: Cadillac $2500 Special Per Month 2156sqft 21st floor
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Nestled next to lushly landscaped Lafayette Park and located within walking distance of Greek Town and the Downtown Business District, Lafayette Towers Apartments is the essence of premier downtown-living. Our historic 22-story towers offer spacious apartment homes with captivating views of the Detroit skyline as well as the Detroit riverfront.

This metropolitan hideaway, located just a stone's throw away from where the Detroit River meets the Canadian border, offers several amenities and is steps away from Downtown Detroit's most popular attractions.

Below are just some of the highlights we offer:

Lafayette Towers provides 24 HOUR SECURITY and access to our 8ft OLYMPIC-SIZE HEATED POOL atop our beautiful rooftop deck.

The apartments have wall to wall windows that create breathtaking views of Detroit (every view at Lafayette Towers is a great view!)

Complimentary Wireless Internet
24-hour Fitness Center
24-hour Laundry Facility
On-Site Dry Cleaning
Bicycle and Resident Storage

Secured Building Entry

Close to Major Freeways
Parking Garage

Rental rates include ALL utilities except electricity!

Text2: 1 bed 1 bath near harper court
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This is a spacious SUNNY one-bedroom apartment. I am subletting until the lease expires at the and of May, so you would have the option to extend the lease if you wanted to stay. I can be flexible at the end of Dec about move in dates.

I am willing to negotiate about leaving some of the furnishings/paint on the wall/AC unit, but mostly the apartment will be unfurnished.

Electricity, gas and wifi are separate. There is laundry and bike storage in the basement of the building. The building is pet friendly.

You'd be renting with a leasing company. They are very good about responding to maintenance issues/other issues. They are convenient and easy to work with. They charge $60 for maintenance fees. They also require a $50 background check for sub-letter, and that you have renter's insurance.

The neighborhood is great. One block from 53rd. 1-ish mile from UChicago

Property Description
Revel in Battle Creek in an apartment community that inspires relaxation. At The Landings at the Preserve Apartments, we keep your peace of mind, top of mind. Our friendly staff greets you with a smile and conversation with neighbors turn into regular play dates for the kids. Fresh green grass hugs the walking trails in our backyard, leading you by two peaceful ponds.Here, even home is a sanctuary within itself: cathedral ceilings, walk-in closets, and a washer and dryer to put your mind at ease. Plus, with major employers like Kellogg’s and Borgess Medical Center a short commute away and shopping and restaurants nearby, everywhere you need to be lies close at hand. As the sun sinks beneath the horizon, settle in to watch the stars pierce the night sky. Rest easy in the home you’ve always hoped to find, here in Battle Creek.

Text2: Stunning 2BR in UK Village: backyard, garage parking, now PET-FRIENDLY
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Be the first lucky tenant to live in this beautiful, freshly renovated 2-BR, 1-bath apartment. The unit is located on the first floor of a tree-filled, family-friendly residential block, a tranquil oasis just a few minutes from bustling Chicago Avenue. Mariano’s grocery store, coffee shops, and a wide variety of fun bars and restaurants are all less than five minutes away. For nature enthusiasts, you are also just two blocks from the tennis courts, a public swimming pool, and the sprawling, lush greenery of Smith Park.

The unit has been completely updated and includes the following:
- Brand-new 42-inch Shaker cabinets, quartz countertops, LED light fixtures, and luxury vinyl floors
- Soaring, nearly 10 foot ceilings and large front windows that let in expansive natural light
- Large closets in each bedroom
- Free laundry, located just outside of the apartment
- Dishwasher
- Shared access to a spacious backyard that is already equipped with outdoor furniture
- Free and abundant street parking, with garage parking available for an additional fee

Tenants must have renter's insurance, and provide EITHER 1) a security deposit equal to one month's rent OR 2) a $400 non-refundable move-in fee upon lease signing. Can do six-month or 12-month lease. Pets are welcome with one-time $250 fee per dog and $150 fee per cat. 

**Note: Some images have been digitally enhanced to represent how the rooms will look with new furniture. The unit does not come furnished.**

Welcome to life at Reserve at Eagle Ridge Apartment Homes! Our community offers spacious and affordable studio, one and two-bedroom apartments for rent in Waukegan, that are perfectly priced for any budget while also providing a level of luxury that is unmatched in the area. When you tour one of our many floor plans, you will notice that we have designed our apartments with your comfort in mind. Enjoy a private patio/balcony, walk-in closets, select units with washer and dryer and other great amenities. Not only will the inside of our apartments provide you with comfort and convenience, but our community features will as well. Relax out by the swimming pool or soak up the sun on our spacious sundeck. Our fully-equipped fitness center is available to all residents, so you can save time and money on a gym membership. Reserve at Eagle Ridge is proud to welcome your furry friends into our community by offering pet-friendly apartments and a private Dog Park to Waukegan residents. Our residents enjoy living minutes from Lake Michigan and the Great Lakes Naval Base. We are also conveniently located near major employers including Abbott Labs and Medline with easy access to major highways US 41 and I-94. Schedule a tour of our apartments today and see why our residents love living here!

Please read carefully as I put a lot of info in the ad to answer most, if not all, of your questions.

Availability:  now

When responding to this ad, please state your 
    - start and end dates of intended lease
    - date/time to view the apartment. 
Preferred viewing time: every day after 3:30pm

Huge one bedroom apartment featuring
- Fully furnished
- huge unit with 850 sf
- Hard wood floor/ceramic tiles throughout. No carpet. Great for people with allergy.
- Lots of storage space with 4 closets, including a walk-in
- 20th floor in a 26 floor high rise building

Location, location, location!
- Cross street from Northwestern Memorial hospital
- One block from Michigan avenue, the shoppers' paradise
- Two blocks from Lake Michigan. Enjoy the beach and fireworks
- Walk, bike and transit to downtown offices. Be green.
- Steps away from grocery stores, like Whole Foods.
- Abundance of restaurants, (movie) theaters, entertainment, nightlife, shopping around
- Over 10 lines of public transportation nearby to go around the city
- Safe, perhaps safest, area in Chicago. A lot of people walk during the night.

Amenity included in the rent:
- All utility (Water, Heat, A/C, Electricity, Garbage disposal). Cooking is electric
- HD digital cable TV
- High speed cable internet with WiFi
- Laundry room in the building
- Sundeck and swimming pool
- Bike room
- 24 hour doorman

Furniture included:
- Dining table and chairs
- Sofa (regular, not pull-out sleeping sofa)
- Desk
- Executive chair
- Coffee table
- King size bed
- Chest
- Dresser
- Nightstand
- Iron and iron board
- Flat digital HD TV

Utensils included:
- Stainless cookware
- Plates, bowls, knives, spoons, forks
- Microwave

NOT included in the rent:
- Valet parking available in the building at about $400/month. You can also do hourly or daily parking. Pay directly to the garage company.

Lease Terms
- 12+ month lease contract at $1900/month
- 6 - 11 month lease contract at $2100/month
- 3 - 5 month lease contract at $2300/month
- 1 - 2 month lease contract at $2500/month
- Partial month will be prorated
- One month security deposit
- No move-in/move-out fee
- Contract fee $300
- Late payment fee $90
- Viewing/virtual viewing (Zoom) of the apartment requires a $50 non-refundable viewing fee.
- The viewing fee will be applied to the first month rent if a contract is signed. Payment should be made through PayPal or Zeller.
- If the landlord refuses the signing of contract, the viewing fee will be returned
- Absolutely no other fees
- Price is not negotiable
- No pets please

Welcome to Harbor Pointe Apartments, a great place to call home. Our quiet community is nestled on the shores of scenic Granville Lake just minutes from the Brown Deer and Bayshore shopping districts. Our pet-friendly community is an ideal setting to call home. We offer a full range of Studio, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartment homes to fit your unique needs. Choose our classic Milwaukee apartments or a townhome with a private entry and garage. Regardless of your needs, our dedicated leasing staff is eager to assist you and show you a better style of living! Living at Harbor Pointe is like condo living without any of the hassles. Our 24-hour emergency maintenance is on call waiting to assist you. The community grounds are professionally maintained. Take a walk through our lush, manicured grounds along our paved jogging paths and enjoy the beauty of nature within the metro area. Hop in our heated indoor pool and take a few laps, or simply let our whirlpool's jets massage away the strain of the workout you'll get in our 2 fully equipped fitness rooms! Enjoy entertainment options that include, American Family Field, The Milwaukee Art Museum, and Downtown Milwaukee with all the best attractions of a big city just a short drive away. Local restaurants include Cafe Hollander, Libby Montana Bar & Grill, and Rocky Rococo. Our leasing professionals look forward to scheduling your personalized tour of your new home and showing you how we are making Harbor Pointe the place to live.

This 2 bedroom home has a smart open living floor plan and it is tastefully decorated with current colors and cool accents throughout. You will love the center island kitchen and cathedral ceiling. And outside you'll find a fun patio, a new privacy fence, a 12 X 16 storage shed, professional landscaping, and even a quiet spot to go hammocking. And what a perfect location! Directly across the street is the Virginia Park and Community Center with tennis, basketball, softball, pickleball, and a playground. And less than a 1/4 mile away is the newly revamped township boat launch with kayak storage.  Perfect house, perfect location!

Hi! 
 
My name is Sydney and I would love to help you with the application process to get you moved in as soon as we can! To get started, If you click on the name of the properties it will take you to our apartments.com page with virtual tours. 
 
Listed below are the current prices for both of our properties and highlighted the units we have coming available! 
 
Westminster Park:
•	1 bedroom, 1 bath apt. home- $950.00 - AVAILABLE 
•	2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1100 - AVAILABLE 
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome - $1295
 
Heritage Glen:
•	1 bedroom, 1 bath townhome- $1025 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1150.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1275.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1375.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
 
Gas, heat, and water are included in your monthly so you are only responsible for your DTE and any kind of cable, internet or streaming services you decide to get.  
 
Qualifications:
To qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3 times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior monies owed to previous landlords; and we will do a criminal background check as well.
 
What to Bring When You Apply:
- 4 most recent paystubs for each leaseholder
- a copy of your social security card and ID (we need this for each person over 18)
- 2 Money orders
        - One for the application fee, this is $50.00 per adult (this is     
           nonrefundable)
        - One for $50 for the reservation fee (this is returned if you are denied,
            if approved it goes towards your security deposit) 

If you have any questions, we are here Mon-Fri from 9a- 6p and Sat. from 9am-4pm. Due to Covid-19, please use our phone number and email for communication. 
 
 
Sydney Hezemy
Leasing Specialist

Taylor, MI 48180

Text2: Townhouse for Lease-KK Parkway (4336 W. Cleveland Ave.)
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
***Townhouse for Lease***

Enjoy living on the Kinnickinnic River Parkway.  This townhouse feels like living in a home and includes:

- Two bedrooms and 1-1/2 baths.
- An updated kitchen with skylight, ceramic range, refrigerator, dishwasher, and garbage disposal.
- Oak cabinets throughout.  Oak floors and woodwork.
- Private front and back entrances.  New storm doors and storm windows.
- New light fixtures throughout.  Recently painted throughout.
- Recently renovated main bath.
- Recent addition including 1/2 bath on first floor.
- Separate basement.

- Off-street parking for two cars.  (see below) 
- Beautiful backyard on KK parkway.  Residential area.
- Well-maintained outside.
- Exceptionally clean and bright inside.
- Hook-ups for washer and electric dryer.
- Hook-ups and wiring for Spectrum cable and internet available.
- Recently installed gas furnace.
- Convenient location near St. Luke's Hospital and Alverno College
- Easy access to shopping, the freeway, and bus lines.
- Owner is on-site for maintenance and yardwork.

Qualifications include:

- A completed application is required for each occupant 18 years and older.
- A current credit report (within the last 30 days) and references are required.
- A background check will be completed for each applicant.
- A credit rating of 650 or more.
- No evictions or unsatisfied money judgments within the last 5 years.
- Verifiable income or 3 times the monthly rent.
- One month security deposit and first month's rent due at lease signing.
- No pets.  No smoking/vaping unit.

- One year lease.
- Rent is $1,175 per month, plus gas and electric utilities.
- Owner pays water, sewer, and garbage collection charges.
- Some assistance with clearing of snow after major snow storms is expected. 
- No basement living/sleeping quarters allowed.
- Off-street parking is provided for two cars.  Sorry, due to space limits, no off-street parking provided for oversize cars, trucks or large SUVs; no vans; no commercial or business vehicles, etc. 

Contact by e-mail or phone (414) 321-zero 5 two 4 for details.  No texts.
PLEASE INCLUDE YOUR FULL NAME AND YOUR CONTACT PHONE NUMBER IN YOUR MESSAGE. 
Thank you.

AVAILABLE:  NOW.

We now book our tour appointments online! Please call or text us at
  show contact info
 to self-schedule from your phone! Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Property Description
You feel it even before you see it. A sense of wonder: leafy trees and vast blue skies catch your eye, as if for the first time. A spirit of refreshment: genuine kindness from our helpful staff, and an atmosphere of calm throughout.You glance around, in awe of so much… space. Private entryways wind toward buildings which tower more like townhomes than the crammed apartments you’re used to. Interiors gleam with that “freshly done” feel: refinished kitchen cabinets; gray appliances; wood-look flooring, just the way you like. Tranquil as it is, it’s almost shocking that the freeways sit so close: M-5, I-275, I-696 and I-96 all within one mile for when your 9-5 beckons toward Troy, Detroit or Novi. As the weekend draws near, you can’t wait to stroll through downtown Farmington for live music and local fare. Welcome to Spring Valley Apartments: a breath of fresh air, and a place you’re proud to call home.

Text2: Fitness Center, Refrigerator, Public Transportation
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Welcome to Harbor Pointe Apartments, a great place to call home. Our quiet community is nestled on the shores of scenic Granville Lake just minutes from the Brown Deer and Bayshore shopping districts. Our pet-friendly community is an ideal setting to call home. We offer a full range of Studio, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartment homes to fit your unique needs. Choose our classic Milwaukee apartments or a townhome with a private entry and garage. Regardless of your needs, our dedicated leasing staff is eager to assist you and show you a better style of living! Living at Harbor Pointe is like condo living without any of the hassles. Our 24-hour emergency maintenance is on call waiting to assist you. The community grounds are professionally maintained. Take a walk through our lush, manicured grounds along our paved jogging paths and enjoy the beauty of nature within the metro area. Hop in our heated indoor pool and take a few laps, or simply let our whirlpool's jets massage away the strain of the workout you'll get in our 2 fully equipped fitness rooms! Enjoy entertainment options that include, American Family Field, The Milwaukee Art Museum, and Downtown Milwaukee with all the best attractions of a big city just a short drive away. Local restaurants include Cafe Hollander, Libby Montana Bar & Grill, and Rocky Rococo. Our leasing professionals look forward to scheduling your personalized tour of your new home and showing you how we are making Harbor Pointe the place to live.

Come home to Water's Edge and relax in our newly renovated community surrounded by mature shade trees, lush landscaping and a beautiful tranquil pond. Water's Edge features one- and two-bedroom apartment homes with a private entrance, air conditioning, spacious closets and so much more. Renovated homes include brand new flooring, energy-efficient kitchen appliances, maple cabinetry and faux granite countertops. Spend the summer months relaxing by the sparkling swimming pool, walking nearby nature trails, fishing in our private lake or reading under one of the shade trees. With easy access to I-96, you are conveniently located near the attractions of Ann Arbor, Novi, South Lyon and Detroit. Join in the fun at nearby Kensington Lake and Park, Riverbank Golf Course or Twelve Oaks Mall... there is something for everyone to enjoy at Water's Edge.

This upper flat has modern convenience with Bay View charm. Updated kitchen includes granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances - dishwasher, gas range, fridge and microwave. Updated bathroom features a subway tile walk-in shower and modern fixtures. 

You and your guests will enjoy picturesque lake views from the lovely, large deck, while a large fenced-in yard provides even more private space for relaxing and entertaining.

Custom wood blinds and new carpet and flooring complete the beautiful finishes in this sunny flat. Bay breezes, ceiling fans, new windows and insulation plus AC and a high efficiency furnace mean you're always comfortable without wasting energy. 

Added convenience includes a large garage with electric opener - convenient for parking and extra storage. Laundry features a front load washer and dryer both with steam features.

Text2: CHARMING COACH HOUSE, HUGE DECK
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Light and bright, this two-story coach house cottage faces on a courtyard garden and is a perfect  romantic getaway right in the city. Upstairs is an airy 400-square-foot space with a cathedral ceiling, lighting inset into beams and oak floors laid on the diagonal. The kitchen, in one corner, features a 1963 Chambers stove and counter seating. A sliding glass door on the side opens onto a huge deck, while two sliding doors in front open onto a smaller balcony. The bedroom, also with oak floors, is downstairs and has closets across the back wall. Adjacent is a tiled bathroom and dressing area. The apartment has its own furnace; ask about heat and electric costs. 

Just minutes from the Mag Mile by bus (which stops on the corner) or bike, the neighborhood has gotten super trendy. Right around the corner on Chicago Avenue are nifty boutiques, two upscale wine shops, and close to a dozen restaurants, among them Noble Thai, Opart Thai, Jeong and Flo. Noble Square’s other attractions--all within walking distance--range from  Frontier on Milwaukee Ave. to Green Grocer, Bari Foods, D’Amato’s, Tempesta, and Coalfire on Grand Ave. The apartment also is across Noble St. from Eckhart Park, which has an indoor swimming pool. 

If you're looking for quirky charm, this is the place for you. If central air, in-unit laundry, and a dishwasher are deal-breakers, don't bother to apply.

If there’s ever a problem, the owner lives right next door.

Text2: 2 Bedroom, 2 bathroom Condo at Victoria Commons
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This compact condo is ideal for a young couple or two professionals sharing. Upgraded ground floor unit in the first condo building at Victoria Commons Development in Kitchener. The development consists of a combination of town homes and condo buildings set around a central courtyard, giving it a neighbourhood feel, yet located just minutes from downtown Kitchener.

Ideal location:
•	Located at Louisa St and St Leger St in Kitchener, just of Margaret Ave.
•	Less than 15 minutes’ walk (or 5 minutes bike ride) to Communitech, Google, School of Pharmacy, Go Transit Terminal and Via Rail, Kitchener Public Library, Centre in the Square, the Registry Theater, Desire 2 Learn, businesses along Victoria Street and all the action in Downtown Kitchener (restaurants, shops, Museum, services etc.).
•	5 minutes’ drive to Highway 85 with access to the 401. 
•	5 minutes’ drive to both Bridgeport Plaza (Sobeys, Shoppers, Walmart, Bulk Barn, Canada Post, Pet Valu etc.) and Fredrick Mall (Independent Grocer, Pharmacy, Dollar Store, Doctor’s office, Medical Imaging and Lab etc.)

Modern, stylish corner condo with tons of upgrades and extras:
•	Open concept main living area with 9’ ceiling
•	Walk out onto private outdoor patio with southern exposure
•	Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and tile backsplash in kitchen
•	Track lighting and under mounted task lighting in kitchen provide tons of light
•	Front loader washer and dryer in unit
•	Laminate and tile flooring throughout 
•	Master bedroom with private ensuite bathroom featuring a large walk-in shower, subway tile and quartz countertop
•	Generous closets in both bedrooms with mirrored closet doors in the master plus a entry closet
•	Second full bathroom with shower/tub combo
•	Fiber or cable high speed internet in unit (fees not included)
•	Individual in-suite climate control (heating and A/C)
•	Building amenities: bookable common room for entertaining and socializing, well equipped gym
•	Includes 1 underground parking spot (no EV charging stations) and storage locker
•	Green Energy Community -Victoria Common features geo-thermal heating and cooling which reduces the community’s carbon footprint

Maintenance free: includes all landscaping and snow removal
Utilities not included
No smoking, small pet negotiable

Text2: Ideal location, vintage charm, heat included – Jan 1
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This cream city brick building was built in 1900 by the Schlitz brewery as a dance hall & saloon.  Prohibition prompted its conversion to 1920’s era apartments.  The available 2 bedroom unit is on the second floor.  The apartment features natural light, a dining room, clawfoot tub with shower, ample closets, high ceilings and hardwood floors.  

The building provides a quiet environment and offers coin laundry, basement lockable storage and a shared back yard with a raised bed garden for your use.  

The Urban Ecology Center, free tennis courts and running track are directly across the street, as are access to the Oak Leaf bike trail, community garden plots, Riverside Park and the Rotary Arboretum.  The Riverside Milwaukee Recreation site is across the playing fields, offering inexpensive art, fitness and other classes and a pool.  The East Side is a highly walkable neighborhood with great restaurants, theaters, the East Library and shopping.  The building is near bus lines and a bike share station.  

Responsive local landlords live 4 blocks away.

Rent is $1260 per month including heat (steam radiators) and water.  Tenant pays for electricity and cooking gas.
Lease through July 31, 2023 with security deposit of $1,275.  Tenant can inquire about renewing with a 1-year lease beginning August 1, 2023.
A garage parking space is available for an additional $85/month.

No smoking  
No pets
We can't accept applicants with past citations for behaviors disturbing to neighbors (noise violations, underage drinking, disorderly conduct, etc.) or histories of nonpayment.

Feel free to e-mail with questions or to request a showing - masks required during in-person showings.  Must pass background and credit checks before lease is offered. ($39 per person paid online).

Please beware - there is a scam in which real ads are copied by a scammer who puts his or her own e-mail in place of the original poster’s contact information.  If photos are not provided or the rent is less than $1260, you are likely seeing this scam.  We will always ask to meet you in person and will not ask for your unencrypted e-mail address until after we have met.  Never make a payment for this rental until after you have met us.

You feel it even before you see it. A sense of wonder: leafy trees and vast blue skies catch your eye, as if for the first time. A spirit of refreshment: genuine kindness from our helpful staff, and an atmosphere of calm throughout.You glance around, in awe of so much… space. Private entryways wind toward buildings which tower more like townhomes than the crammed apartments you’re used to. Interiors gleam with that “freshly done” feel: refinished kitchen cabinets; gray appliances; wood-look flooring, just the way you like. Tranquil as it is, it’s almost shocking that the freeways sit so close: M-5, I-275, I-696 and I-96 all within one mile for when your 9-5 beckons toward Troy, Detroit or Novi. As the weekend draws near, you can’t wait to stroll through downtown Farmington for live music and local fare. Welcome to Spring Valley Apartments: a breath of fresh air, and a place you’re proud to call home.

Text2: Westminster Park Welcomes You
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        

Hi! 
 
My name is Sydney and I would love to help you with the application process to get you moved in as soon as we can! To get started, If you click on the name of the properties it will take you to our apartments.com page with virtual tours. 
 
Listed below are the current prices for both of our properties and highlighted the units we have coming available! 
 
Westminster Park:
•	1 bedroom, 1 bath apt. home- $950.00 - AVAILABLE 
•	2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1100 - AVAILABLE 
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome - $1295
 
Heritage Glen:
•	1 bedroom, 1 bath townhome- $1025 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1150.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1275.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1375.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
 
Gas, heat, and water are included in your monthly so you are only responsible for your DTE and any kind of cable, internet or streaming services you decide to get.  
 
Qualifications:
To qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3 times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior monies owed to previous landlords; and we will do a criminal background check as well.
 
What to Bring When You Apply:
- 4 most recent paystubs for each leaseholder
- a copy of your social security card and ID (we need this for each person over 18)
- 2 Money orders
        - One for the application fee, this is $50.00 per adult (this is     
           nonrefundable)
        - One for $50 for the reservation fee (this is returned if you are denied,
            if approved it goes towards your security deposit) 

If you have any questions, we are here Mon-Fri from 9a- 6p and Sat. from 9am-4pm. Due to Covid-19, please use our phone number and email for communication. 
 
 
Sydney Hezemy
Leasing Specialist
Heritage Glen Townhomes
9633 East Pickwick Circle
Taylor, MI 48180

Text2: Near Med Campus 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath plus Deck in Historic1832 Building
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Live in a piece of Ann Arbor's History! The Anson Brown Building was built in 1832 and is Ann Arbor's oldest commercial building.

The apartment occupies the entire 3rd floor (approximately 1800 square feet) plus a large private deck and the entre attic for storage. There is a barn door that allows you to create a separate space for a home office or for entertaining. Open floor plan for dining room, living room and kitchen. Three bedrooms with walk in closets and 2 full baths.

Centrally located: near the U of M Hospital, Medical Campus, Kerrytown, Farmers Market, Zingerman's Deli, down the block from Northside Grill and across the street Argo Park. If you like biking, hiking, canoeing, tubing or running, this is the place to be!

It has all modern amenities:

- Kitchen with granite counter tops and stainless appliances
- Stainless Bosch Dishwasher
- French Style 3 Door Refrigerator with ice maker and water dispenser
- Thermal windows with marble window sills
- Large private deck
- Open floor plan for kitchen, dining room and living room
- Stacked HE washer and dryer
- Lots of Closets! Walk ins in each bedroom, coat, linen, pantry, and utility closets
- Sliding Barn Door allows for a separate home office
- Private Entrance
- Up to 3 off street parking spaces

Contact Jim at  show contact info

 Virtual and Contact-Free Leasing and Move-In Available  - Self-Guided Tours with Lockboxes  - FaceTime/Skype Tours  - Apply & Sign Online  President Madison Apartments 31597 Harlo Drive, Madison Heights, MI, 48071Call Now -  show contact info

 to contact us.Interested In This Unit? Use this link for more details:https://wwwbeztakcom.gotoapt.com/819d5t President Madison Apartments This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 820 Sq. Ft.  BRAND NEW COMMUNITY CENTER featuring an expansive Social Gathering Room, fitness center with state-of-the-art fitness equipment and flat screen televisions and a beautifully designed outdoor pool. Our terrific location makes it easy for residents to walk or drive to some of the most entertaining parts of our city. Pop into Birmingham for the day, relax and enjoy some family time at Halmich Park or just take your dog on a walk to the nearby dog park. Anywhere you want to go is easily accessible and within just a few minutes drive from your front door.Inside our East Madison Heights apartments, residents are happy to find upgraded countertops and cabinets, name brand appliances, including gas stoves, individual heating and cooling systems and even ceramic and hardwood flooring and dishwashers in select homes.Our heated hallways and mail box areas will keep those cold MI winters at bay and modern conveniences like an on-site laundry facility, friendly management staff and online payments make living here a breeze.In addition to our spacious one and two bedroom floor plans, President Madison Apartments also offers temporary lease agreements for those visitors or business people who don’t want to spend all of their time in the confines of a hotel. Our well-appointed, furnished apartments provide a tranquil retreat when visiting Madison Heights. Pet Policy President Madison offers pet friendly apartments in Madison Heights and welcomes both cats in all apartments and dogs in select apartments. You'll find beautiful green spaces where your pet dog can run and play. In addition, your dog can run free and meet new friends at the nearby Red Oak Dog Park.We are one of the few communities in the area to welcome your large dog! We have a limit of 2 pets under 25 lbs each or one large pet without a weight limit. Some breed restrictions apply. We're confident your pet will love living at President Madison as much as our human neighbors do!  Driving Directions:From I-75N:Exit at 12 Mile Rd. and turn right.Turn left at John R Rd.Pass 13 Mille and you will see Sam's Club on your right.Turn right at the first street after Sam's Club (Irving).Turn left at the next main street, Harlo.President Madison Apartments is in the apartment building 31597 with a blue and white sign in front.From I-75S:Exit at 14 Mile Rd. and turn left.Turn right at John R Rd.Turn left at Whitcomb (7-11 and target).Turn right at the next main street, Harlo.President Madison Apartments is in the apartment building 31597 with a blue and white sign in front.Office Hours:Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PMSaturday: 10:00AM-6:00PMQJX3bxfCu

Text2: 21 unit portfolio for SALE
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Serious inquiries only! No wholesalers! Please be sure to put your contact info in your reply so I can reach back out to you.

21-home SFR portfolio scattered about in Montgomery, AL. There are eleven 2-bedroom, eight 3-bedroom, and two 4-bedroom homes. The average asking price per home of $57,142 is significantly below the average home sales price of $248,793 (April 2022) in Montgomery, AL according to Culverhouse College of Business. The seller purchased the homes one at a time over the past decade. Upon acquisition, the seller deployed the necessary capital to improve the homes. Improvements include kitchen and bath remodels, roofs and repairs, new HVAC units where needed, as well as cosmetic alterations during tenant turns. The homes are 100% occupied. Gross rents are a little over $14,000 a month. Many of the tenants have been in place for more than two years. The portfolio is self-managed providing an investor the opportunity to employ a professional management company to improve operational efficiencies. Another immediate value-add opportunity is raising rents on the month to-month tenants.

Text2: Great 2 BR Apt
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Beautiful 2 BR first floor apt, big living room with a built-in air conditioner, re-decorated eat-in kitchen with refrigerator, stove and lots of cabinet space. Both bedrooms have double closets and hardwood floors. There is one assigned parking space included, shared porches and a storage locker and laundry in the basement. Close to Wauwatosa, major bus lines and easy access to downtown. Building has a history of good long-term tenants. Security deposit is $725. Available between Nov. 15 and Dec. 1st. Pictures are not the actual apt that will be available but are very similar to it. The biggest difference is the color of the appliances, instead of white, the stove is black and the refrigerator is stainless steel.

During the worst of COVID-19, I started doing pre-screening and private showings to limit everyone's exposure to it. I found this approach to be more effective and efficient than my old method of having an "open house" so I have decided to continue it even though COVID-19 is less of and issue than it was then. If you are reading this ad, the apt is still available.
Please reply by email if you have more questions or are interested in providing the information I need to pre-screen. If you prefer to discuss the apt by phone you can call Jerry at 262-789-86twotwo, however, all pre-screen info needs to be given via email.

Info needed for pre-screen (you can copy this, hit "reply" above the ad title, then paste and fill it out in your email reply, please provide the info for each adult who will be residing at apt):

-Full name and birth date of each adult who will be residing at apt ________________________
-Name(s) and age(s) of child(ren) that will be living with you____________________________
-Current address________________________How long?_________Your phone #_____________
-Landlord name and contact info_________________________________________
-Current Employer_______________Starting date_______Gross Monthly Income______
Employer Address and Phone #___________________________ Job Title____________
-Additional Monthly income and source___________________________________

After doing the pre-screening I will contact the applicants who are likely to be approved to schedule a private showing.

Some of the Qualifications:
*Must be 18 years or over
*Must have at least $2200/Mo in verifiable household gross income
*Bring Photo ID to showing, also having proof of income at that time will expedite an application
*Be able to get WE Energies in your name
*Able to pay FULL Security deposit within a day of application approval
*No evictions in past 10 yrs.

Property is owned by a WI Licensed Real Estate Broker

Text2: Beautiful home for rent on Spring Lake
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Hi, 

This is a beautiful home for rent during the winter months on Spring Lake in Spring Lake, MI. The home normally rents as a VRBO short term rental during the summer months, where it rents for $559 a night, but it will be available September 2022 through the end of April 2023 as a longer term rental. 

The following is more information about the house:

5 Bedroom, 3 Full Baths, Sleeps 10, Beautiful Water View, Private large Boat Dock on Spring Lake and minutes from Grand Haven stores and beaches

3 smart TVs

LOWER LEVEL

*1 BR with an attached full bath

*Full Kitchen with an electric stove, dishwasher, coffee machine, toaster, microwave, dishes for 12.

*Laundry area, washer, and dryer

*Large Living room and 2 dining locations.

*Access to the beautiful outdoor deck and yard.

OUTDOORS

*Gorgeous 180 degree water view.

*Beautiful deck with outdoor furniture: table, chairs, picnic table, gas grill, back yard with loan

*Large dock to park your boat

*2 car garage to park your car

*Access to Spring Lake water.

UPPER LEVEL

*Master BR with a full bath

*3 more BRS and a full bath with twin beds.

Located 2 blocks away (walking distance) from main shops in Spring Lake and just 2.64 miles from channel and downtown Grand Haven, where you will find many fine shops, restaurants, and the State Park Beach, walk on the pier or ride a bike to the beautiful lighthouse. There are close to 65 different activities in nearby areas.

Thank you!

Lovely bedroom and bathroom duplex . Countless improvements include new roof, driveway, patio, electrical, completely new kitchen, new bathrooms, new flooring. Spacious interior with eat-in kitchen, formal dining room, generous sized living room, one bedroom on first floor and a half bath.  bedrooms and full bath on the second level. Lawn and snow ￼
Welcome to Harbor Pointe Apartments, a great place to call home. Our quiet community is nestled on the shores of scenic Granville Lake just minutes from the Brown Deer and Bayshore shopping districts. Our pet-friendly community is an ideal setting to call home. We offer a full range of Studio, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartment homes to fit your unique needs. Choose our classic Milwaukee apartments or a townhome with a private entry and garage. Regardless of your needs, our dedicated leasing staff is eager to assist you and show you a better style of living! Living at Harbor Pointe is like condo living without any of the hassles. Our 24-hour emergency maintenance is on call waiting to assist you. The community grounds are professionally maintained. Take a walk through our lush, manicured grounds along our paved jogging paths and enjoy the beauty of nature within the metro area. Hop in our heated indoor pool and take a few laps, or simply let our whirlpool's jets massage away the strain of the workout you'll get in our 2 fully equipped fitness rooms! Enjoy entertainment options that include, American Family Field, The Milwaukee Art Museum, and Downtown Milwaukee with all the best attractions of a big city just a short drive away. Local restaurants include Cafe Hollander, Libby Montana Bar & Grill, and Rocky Rococo. Our leasing professionals look forward to scheduling your personalized tour of your new home and showing you how we are making Harbor Pointe the place to live.

Text2: Cozy 3 Bd/1 Ba Furnished Unit (Utilities Incl., FREE Wi-Fi & Laundry!)
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
I have a cozy 3 bedroom/1 bathroom unit with updated living spaces available to rent in the hip Bucktown/Logan Square area of town starting mid-December. The rent is $2,200 and includes...

- Fully furnished living room and dining room
- Renovated kitchen with all kitchen essentials, large and small kitchen appliances including a refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, blender, toaster, etc. I can store all small electrics away if you have your own.
- Utilities Included! FREE high-speed Wi-Fi, water, as well as Netflix and select other services (HBO Max, Paramount+) (livestream gaming that uses large amounts of bandwidth is an upcharge)
- The two smaller bedrooms come with closets, nightstands, lamp, full-size platform beds with built in drawers for storage and remote-controlled ceiling fans. The master bedroom comes with a queen bed instead. The bedrooms will be perfect accommodation for up to 2 people in each room. 
- FREE LAUNDRY facilities in the unit in the basement with top-of-the-line large-capacity front-loading washer and dryer
- Newly installed backyard fence and deck

The Neighborhood:
There are LOTS of great restaurants, coffee shops, bars, stores, music venues, parks and other attractions in the neighborhood. Bustling and trendy Wicker Park and Bucktown is a 10-minute walk or just 1 stop on the Blue line. Walking distance to 2 grocery stores (Fresh Market and Aldi).

Getting Around:
There is free parking on the streets nearby or you can get parking stickers from the city to park on the street. Western, Armitage and Milwaukee buses are right by the house or the Western blue line stop is less than 5 minutes away. Five stops on the Blue line will take you to the loop for business or recreation in about 15 minutes. Besides the train, there are buses that can help take you anywhere you need. And of course, there are also taxis and Ubers galore.

I can send you a video tour first. If still interested, I can then arrange an in-person viewing. Please note that this unit is located in a 2-unit building, which means please be respectful of your noise levels since others live in the building.

Text2: 1 bedroom upstairs apartment
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
I have a small 1 bedroom, 1 bath upstairs apartment for rent.  $575 per month plus electric, $625 for 2 person plus 300 security deposit. The heat is electric, so winter it would range from $120-150 depending on usage.  Would be good for a student or single person, not much space-Not a family unit by any means.  1 parking spot is included, there is street parking, but the soo doesn't allow overnight street parking in winter.  Water and garbage are included.  No dogs, spayed cats are ok as long as the owner is responsible.  There currently isn't a laundry facility, but there's a laundromat 5 blocks away and there will be a coin laundry room soon.
You can apply by simply copying and pasting the application below and providing your answers to the questions.  Hit the reply button to start the email. 
1.  Full Name:
2.  Please provide your source of income, amount isn't necessary (ie:  employment, ssi, disability etc.):
3.  Do you smoke? Y/N:
4.  Have you ever been evicted?           If yes, why?
5.  Can you provide a personal reference?  (ie, former landlord, roommate, parent) :
6.  Have you ever been convicted of a felony?
7.  Would you agree to a background check, if selected?
8.  Do you have the minimum amount to move in, if selected ($575 + 300 security deposit for single person or $625 + 300 for 2 persons)?

Gas, heat, and water are included in your monthly, so you are only responsible for your DTE and any kind of cable, internet or streaming services you decide to get.

 

Qualifications:

To qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3 times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior monies owed to previous landlords; and we will do a criminal background check as well.

 

What to Bring When You Apply:

- 4 most recent paystubs for each leaseholder

- a copy of your social security card and ID (we need this for each person over 18)

- 2 Money orders

- One for the application fee, this is $50.00 per adult (this is

nonrefundable)

- One for $50 for the reservation fee (this is returned if you are denied,

if approved it goes towards your security deposit)

Text2: Air Conditioner, Courtyard, Large Closets
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Welcome home to Glenbrook Apartments! We are a pet-friendly apartment & townhome community conveniently located in Milwaukee. Glenbrook apartments and townhomes are minutes from I-43 and US 45 providing an easy commute to work, shopping, and entertainment locales. Our traditional 3 bedroom townhomes feature spacious kitchens, ample closet space, private garages, and full basements with washers and dryers included. Our 1 bedroom apartment homes provide a unique floor plan compared to the average 1 bedroom. The features of Glenbrook Apartments are a blend of necessity and luxury. We have a Wi-Fi cafe with computers available, a community room overlooking the lake, laundry facilities, and underground parking. Our community also has a variety of recreational and outdoor amenities. We have a tennis court, indoor heated pool, hot tub, fitness center, walking trail, dog parks, and a playground. Whether you are looking to take a walk around our 40-acre lake or spend a relaxing night at home, Glenbrook can accommodate your lifestyle. We are committed to excellence, and will continually strive to make your Milwaukee Neighborhood apartment a special place to live. Call us today!

-Playground
-Online Payments Available
-Swimming Pool
-Fitness Center
-Laundry Facility
-Business Center
-Air Conditioner
-Large Closet
-Recycling
-Pet Friendly
-Wi Fi Cafe with computers
-Laundry Facilities

Monday-Friday: 9AM-5:30PM

9220 N 7th St, Milwaukee, WI 53223

For more information, visit us at: https://livingmonarch.com/xcj76gpp/glenbrook

2 bedroom floor plans, Elegant framed oak cabinets
column5:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
10123 West Forest Home Avenue, Hales Corners, WI 53130From the Botanical Gardens to the Nature Center, there’s a private footpath that takes you home to Whitnall Glen. This quaint, private community awaits you with friendly neighbors and caring management.,Near the center of the Village of Hales Corners, convenient shopping and dining are just a short walk away, as well as immediate freeway access. Whether you want to bicycle, cross country ski or just take a quiet stroll, Whitnall Park is just outside your door.,Architecturally distinctive, these stone-detailed residences are designed with energy-efficient construction and convenience for your comfort. Desired amenities such as private entries, cathedral ceilings, patios or decks and marble vanities are just a few of the stylish appointments contained within these one bedroom with den or two bedroom apartment homes. A private garage, dishwasher and individual laundry facilities provide exceptional value at an affordable price.Apartment Features:Marble vanity topsConvenient snack barFully equipped kitchen with range/oven, refrigerator, and dishwasherIn-home washer and dryerMaster fire alarmIndividually controlled heating and air conditioningWeatherized vinyl windows with insulated glassQuality, quiet, energy-efficient constructionCommunity Features:Skilled management and maintenance available 24 hoursDirect access to Whitnall Park footpathsConvenient Forest Home location in the heart of Hales CornersPet friendly - no weight limit, doggie stationsWhitnall School District: Hales Corners Elementary, Whitnall Middle and High SchoolsCall:  show contact info
For more information, visit us at: https://livewimmer.com/huhfbnwq/whitnall-glen*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily. Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit. Contact us today for the most up-to-date information!

Text2: Fresh air, Fresh Home
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Devonshire On Canal welcomes you to where quality meets comfort. This smoke-free community offers spacious 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms floor plans; featuring private patios or balconies, walk-in closets and fireplaces in select homes.
Enjoy resort-style living by relaxing in our swimming pool with sundeck, workout in the on-site fitness center, walk our lush landscape or play a game of tennis and basketball. We have everything close by as far as shopping, nice restaurants and highway. Nestled in an excellent location with everything right outside your front door.
***HEAT/GAS INCLUDED IN ALL OUR RENT PRICING!***
1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom....662 sq.ft......$895 plus a fixed rate on water/sewer/trash
2 Bedroom 1 Bathroom....947 sq.ft......$1,050 plus a fixed rate on water/sewer/trash
2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom....961 sq.ft......$1,120 plus a fixed rate on water/sewer/trash
3 Bedroom 2 Bathroom....1300 sq.ft....$1,395 plus a fixed rate on water/sewer/trash
4 Bedroom 2 Bathroom....1500 sq.ft....$1,595 plus a fixed rate on water/sewer/trash
WASHER & DRYER:
1 & 2 Bedroom Apartments, the washer and dryer are located in your building.
3 & 4 Bedroom Apartments, the washer and dryer are located inside your apartment.
Parking: All Uncovered Parking is first come first serve. Covered Parking is optional and offered at $20 a month for a covered parking spot.

Please call to reserve your new home today

QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
To schedule a tour
We now book our tour appointments online! Please call or text us at
  show contact info
 to self-schedule from your phone! Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Property Description
You feel it even before you see it. A sense of wonder: leafy trees and vast blue skies catch your eye, as if for the first time. A spirit of refreshment: genuine kindness from our helpful staff, and an atmosphere of calm throughout.You glance around, in awe of so much… space. Private entryways wind toward buildings which tower more like townhomes than the crammed apartments you’re used to. Interiors gleam with that “freshly done” feel: refinished kitchen cabinets; gray appliances; wood-look flooring, just the way you like. Tranquil as it is, it’s almost shocking that the freeways sit so close: M-5, I-275, I-696 and I-96 all within one mile for when your 9-5 beckons toward Troy, Detroit or Novi. As the weekend draws near, you can’t wait to stroll through downtown Farmington for live music and local fare. Welcome to Spring Valley Apartments: a breath of fresh air, and a place you’re proud to call home.

Availability date: November 29, 2022
Pets: Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)

Come and take a walk through meandering pathways and be surrounded by the beautiful, lush landscaping that adorns Northgate Apartments. With its scenic atmosphere and short distance to major highways, local schools, restaurants and entertainment attractions, Northgate Apartments in North Waukegan is the ideal place to call home! Northgate Apartments has it all! This quaint and tranquil enclave offers quality living at an affordable price in an unbeatable location! We offer 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartments with seven meticulously-designed floor plans, each appointed with attractive amenities to include well-equipped gourmet kitchens with pantry, a private balcony/patio, plush wall-to-wall carpeting, air conditioning, washer/dryers in unit and more! Our residents are offered highly desirable first-class amenities! Take a refreshing dip in our heated resort-style swimming pool or have an afternoon workout in our 24 hour fitness center. Enjoy concierge services and conveniences such as on-site maintenance, part-time courtesy patrol, guest parking and copy and fax services. Text2: One Bedroom with Home Office / Smart Room by Blue Line
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Sunny one bedroom with home office/smart room on 2nd floor apartment in quiet courtyard building on tree-lined residential street. Rent is $1200.00 per month and includes heat. Apartment has a home office / den, kitchen with walk-in pantry and appliances, refinished hardwood floors, ceiling fans, and mini-blinds. Bathroom is tiled and has marble floor. Janitor and laundry on premises. Tenant pays electric and cooking gas. Walk to the CTA Blue Line, Metra (Montrose) and shopping. Close to the Kennedy-Edens junction. One fixed cat welcome. NO DOGS. No security deposit required. $35.00 credit check fee per person. Move-in fee is waived when application is completed within 24 hours of viewing. Apartment building is owner-managed. Available for December 1 move-in. No texts or emails. Must call to see:  773-343-6382.

ID: 238623512Rent: $4,695 / MonthBeds: 6Bath: 4Available Date: 07/01/2022Pet: Cats OnlyParking:: street parking
***ONE MONTH FREE***

This three story coach house is one stand-alone unit with six bedrooms, four full baths and plenty of common living space. The apartment has a large living room and kitchen, the kitchen comes complete with a built in granite island and granite counter-tops. The kitchen also has plenty of cabinet space and a dishwasher. Tenant controlled central air conditioning and gas forced heat are also convenient aspects of this unit. There are laundry facilities in the building.

This wonderful Victorian building is tucked away on a quiet tree lined street, yet is in the very heart of Lakeview, steps from Halsted and Clark Streets. Belmont Avenue, which is just a block north, has a number of local boutiques and charming restaurants as well as the CTA El stop with connections to the Red, Brown, and Purple Express Lines. Surrounding major streets also have a variety of dining and entertainment options including several theaters. Lake Shore Drive and Chicago’s lakefront are located two blocks east. This provides easy commuter transportation as well as a number of outdoor activities including biking, running, golf, and lounging on the beach. The #22 Clark street bus stop is less than a block away and offers a quick route to downtown all night long.

We offer a hassle-free full online leasing process featuring online applications, lease signing, and payment options.

NO DOGS, Cats ok!

NORTHRIDGE APARTMENTS offers convenient housing in Oakland County with easy access to M-59 and I-75. AND, we're just minutes from Fiat Chrysler, Oakland University, and Oakland Community College.

Our pet-friendly community features 1 and 2 bedroom apartments and Townhomes. We offer leasing options from 6-18 months, and furnished options shorter than 6 months.

Northridge is located just south of historic downtown Rochester, with local shopping, dining, and entertainment.
We are also within walking distance from the Clinton River Trails and connection to Paint Creek Trail.
Our residents can take advantage of the well-respected Rochester school district.

Text2: $5br - 2000ft2 - *Utilities Updated*-**Price Reduced** family friendly
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
*Utilities Updated* Located in the highly desirable neighborhood of Toledo , OH, this updated historic 5 bed, 2 bath bungalow awaits! Just blocks away from Whitefish schools, markets, parks, coffeeshops, theatre, restaurants and more! Whitefish is a year-round destination for outdoor recreation and Big Mountain is only a 15 minute drive from your front door. This home is located on a family friendly street with lots of street parking and little traffic. The open concept layout connects the front porch, living, dining and kitchen area's which makes for great entertaining. Additionally, the main floor offers a mudroom, two bedrooms and a Jack and Jill full bathroom. The finished basement offers 2 more bedrooms plus 1 master size bedroom, in addition to the laundry area and a 3/4 bathroom. There is a 6th room that is unfinished and available for storage. Rent includes water, sewer, gas, garbage and high speed internet. You pay power and that's it! One dedicated parking spot in the back plus street parking and a fully fenced backyard perfect for your children or pet. $1,500 damage deposit. Pets welcome with pre-approval and $300 non-refundable pet deposit.

Property Description
You work hard enough. Why not enjoy your days? Summer Ridge sits four miles from Western Michigan University with Pfizer, Borgess Medical and Perrigo Co. nearby, which means less time in the car; more time poolside.Break a sweat in the cardio fitness center, or at the tennis and sand volleyball courts outside. Shoot some hoops at our basketball court, or lounge with a good book in our roomy clubhouse. And did we mention the lake? Of course, staying home’s just half the fun. With the Kalamazoo 10 theater and Maple Hill Mall a brisk walk away, dinner with friends at Applebee’s followed by the latest flick could become your new favorite pastime. Come enjoy each day when you call Summer Ridge, home.

Text2: Cozy family 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath home is ready for its new owner!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
First time ever offered, this well maintained 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath home is ready for its new owner! This home has so much to offer, from its large living room with hardwood floors to a cozy family room that leads out to a great covered patio that has been recently redone with newer concrete. The private back yard gives you plenty of space to enjoy family gatherings. The large bright kitchen with ample storage is sure to please. The nice sized bedrooms have hardwood floors and the master is attached to the walk-thru half bath. Downstairs you will find a retro style finished basement, great for entertaining! Pool table and custom booths included. This home is convenient to shopping, restaurants, freeway and schools, yet tucked away in a quiet neighborhood. Welcome home! If you are interested please Text me your contact number. I will contact soon.

Text2: Burlington3 Bedroom Lake Condo
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Awesome Burlington Lakefront Condo on Browns Lake.  Amazing setting and amenities.  Includes boat slip, private beach, indoor year round pool, game room, sauna and golf course a stones throw away. Perfect executive getaway offering 2/3 bedrooms (2 large one small bedroom), 2 full baths, large sun room with newer double pane windows and sliding glass doors.  In-unit washer hook up in the utility room. Also included is an extra large private patio that is shared only with the other penthouse. You will not be disappointed.

Unit has excellent storage and also includes storage unit in the basement and boat parking.

You feel it even before you see it. A sense of wonder: leafy trees and vast blue skies catch your eye, as if for the first time. A spirit of refreshment: genuine kindness from our helpful staff, and an atmosphere of calm throughout.You glance around, in awe of so much… space. Private entryways wind toward buildings which tower more like townhomes than the crammed apartments you’re used to. Interiors gleam with that “freshly done” feel: refinished kitchen cabinets; gray appliances; wood-look flooring, just the way you like. Tranquil as it is, it’s almost shocking that the freeways sit so close: M-5, I-275, I-696 and I-96 all within one mile for when your 9-5 beckons toward Troy, Detroit or Novi. As the weekend draws near, you can’t wait to stroll through downtown Farmington for live music and local fare. Welcome to Spring Valley Apartments: a breath of fresh air, and a place you’re proud to call home.

Text2: Beautiful 2 BED/2 BATH condo available in River West!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
2 BED/2 BATH luxury condo just minutes from the Loop. Enjoy unobstructed city views from dining room, living room and private balcony. Kitchen boasts BRAND NEW WHITE QUARTZ counter tops, upgraded Italian wood grain cabinets, peninsula island that looks out onto combo living/dining area, floor to ceiling plate glass windows, gas fireplace, vertical window blinds, upgraded SS appliances w/convection oven. HUGE floor to ceiling custom built Elfa designed closets in each bedroom, enclosed laundry/storage area, marble master bath w/rainfall steam shower and Jacuzzi tub. Maple hardwood floors throughout, carpet in bedrooms, video camera security and so much more! One heated garage parking space INCLUDED in rent! 

River West is a perfect location for public transportation (1 block to Blue Line train; 1/2 block from Chicago Ave, Milwaukee and Halsted bus lines), easy access to downtown and all neighborhoods (Bucktown, Wicker Park, Mag Mile), shopping, and highways. River West is located right on the edge of the hot Fulton River District in what has now become one of the most popular neighborhoods in downtown Chicago real estate. The growing community has been attracting urbanites that are drawn to its immediacy to downtown, and has since become a trendsetting neighborhood, home to the hottest restaurants and clubs, and with an up-and-coming gallery scene. Walking along "Restaurant Row" on Randolph St, one will find scores of trendy, top-notch restaurants, like Girl and the Goat, Beatrix and Avec. With the Loop about half a mile west, residents can also easily walk to other hot spots, theatre, museums, shopping, and parks.

Welcome to Southfield's best kept secret! Cranbrook Centre Apartments offers huge one- and two-bedroom apartments in Southfield, MI. Come take advantage of our amenities, which include a sparkling pool, business center, and expertly decorated clubhouse with comfortable seating areas and a kitchen with bar. We pride ourselves on being there for our residents and we offer on-site 24-hour maintenance, intercom entry, courteous on-site leasing team, concierge services, and laundry facilities.

Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
 Virtual and Contact-Free Leasing and Move-In Available  - Self-Guided Tours with Lockboxes  - FaceTime/Skype Tours  - Apply & Sign Online President Madison Apartments 31597 Harlo Drive, Madison Heights, MI, 48071Follow This Link for More Information:https://wwwbeztakcom.gotoapt.com/hqtLa8 Call Now:  show contact info
 x 4OR Text 4 to  show contact info
 to contact our leasing team.President Madison Apartments This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 820 Sq. Ft.  BRAND NEW COMMUNITY CENTER featuring an expansive Social Gathering Room, fitness center with state-of-the-art fitness equipment and flat screen televisions and a beautifully designed outdoor pool. Our terrific location makes it easy for residents to walk or drive to some of the most entertaining parts of our city. Pop into Birmingham for the day, relax and enjoy some family time at Halmich Park or just take your dog on a walk to the nearby dog park. Anywhere you want to go is easily accessible and within just a few minutes drive from your front door.Inside our East Madison Heights apartments, residents are happy to find upgraded countertops and cabinets, name brand appliances, including gas stoves, individual heating and cooling systems and even ceramic and hardwood flooring and dishwashers in select homes.Our heated hallways and mail box areas will keep those cold MI winters at bay and modern conveniences like an on-site laundry facility, friendly management staff and online payments make living here a breeze.In addition to our spacious one and two bedroom floor plans, President Madison Apartments also offers temporary lease agreements for those visitors or business people who don’t want to spend all of their time in the confines of a hotel. Our well-appointed, furnished apartments provide a tranquil retreat when visiting Madison Heights. Features - Dishwashers available in select homes  - Soft hued paint accented with white paneled doors  - Spacious closets  - Spacious living room and bedrooms featuring plush neutral carpet  - Well-designed floor plans ranging from 800 to 856 square feet  - Brick buildings and traditional architecture  - Resident Storage located on-site  - Updated lighting throughout the apartment home  - Gas Range in all apartment homes  - Beautifully designed kitchen featuring oak cabinetry, GE white appliances and dark walnut* vinyl plank flooring  - Satin nickel hardware throughout residence  - Common laundry room with full size GE wash and dryer  - Secured entrance for each residence  - Carports available  - Accent walls in living area of apartment home  - Large picture windows fitted with designer selected blinds Community Amenities - Free off-street parking  - Beautifully designed outdoor swimming pool  - On-site management  - Laundry in building  - BRAND NEW!! Professionally equipped exercise room with flat screen television  - BRAND NEW!! Expansive community center  - On-site laundry  - Reserved carports available to lease monthly based on availability  - BRAND NEW!! Internet café with gourmet coffee bar  - Beautifully landscaped  - On-line Resident Portal (see Resident Services tab)  - Easy highway access  - Pet friendly with well-designated pet area, close to city dog park  - 24-hour Maintenance Response Guarantee Driving Directions From I-75N:Exit at 12 Mile Rd. and turn right.Turn left at John R Rd.Pass 13 Mille and you will see Sam's Club on your right.Turn right at the first street after Sam's Club (Irving).Turn left at the next main street, Harlo.President Madison Apartments is in the apartment building 31597 with a blue and white sign in front.From I-75S:Exit at 14 Mile Rd. and turn left.Turn right at John R Rd.Turn left at Whitcomb (7-11 and target).Turn right at the next main street, Harlo.President Madison Apartments is in the apartment building 31597 with a blue and white sign in front. Office Hours Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PMSaturday: 10:00AM-6:00PMPet Policy President Madison offers pet friendly apartments in Madison Heights and welcomes both cats in all apartments and dogs in select apartments. You'll find beautiful green spaces where your pet dog can run and play. In addition, your dog can run free and meet new friends at the nearby Red Oak Dog Park.We are one of the few communities in the area to welcome your large dog! We have a limit of 2 pets under 25 lbs each or one large pet without a weight limit. Some breed restrictions apply. We're confident your pet will love living at President Madison as much as our human neighbors do! x1blO9Yq

Westbrook Place Apartments

We offer some great amenities, and our location can't be beat! We're located across the street from Irving Park, where you can walk the trails, visit the duck pond, or play disc golf! With walking distance of Bronson Battle Creek Hospital, Kellogg Community College, and Battle Creek Central High School. We are also near numerous drug stores, restaurants, and a grocery store.

Westbrook place is an affordable Senior housing community, for individuals 55 years of age and older with utilities included. Residents are responsible for their cable, internet and phone. We are 6 floors tall with 2 elevators, but you can take the stairs if you'd like! We are a pet friendly community with a few exceptions.

A list of community amenities include :

-Door-Side Trash Pick-up - Monday, Wednesday, and Friday
-Community Laundry Facilities - 3 new washers and dryers available for resident use 24 hours
-Hot or cold lunch service delivered to your door for Residents who sign up for it
-Secured entrance - We have a secure entrance so residents can choose who to let into the building

The apartments themselves feature tall ceilings, central Air Conditioning and Heating, and all appliances are included, even microwaves.

Text2: Barndominium 2bed/2bath Entire House ++Hot Tub
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Unique one of a kind home in Reed City, MI - 1hr north of Grand Rapids, 15min to Big Rapids, 28min to Cadillac. My Grandparents converted this barn into a house in 1970. Incredible natural wood throughout. Very quiet and peaceful. Beautiful backyard area with black raspberry bushes and space to garden. 

Nice patio with picnic table, and Hot Tub! Outdoor firepit, extra large indoor fireplace and brand new gas heater make the whole place very cozy in the winter. AC units also available for summer. 

Downstairs has hardwood flooring, kitchen and living room / office desk, carpeted upstairs has bathroom with bathtub and 2 bedrooms. Includes dishwasher and laundry washer/dryer, and extra-large Fridge

Garage not included with rental, and is separate/detached from house. 

Landlord covers water and sewer, tenant responsible for other utilities - gas, electric, wifi, trash service, and land/snow removal.

***Unfurnished Rental - we are repainting the walls white and will update the pics to show current layout once complete

Ideal tenants have 3x rental income, 600+ credit score, and good rental references. 

Move-in is 1st-months rent and a security deposit equal to 1 months rent

This is perfect for 2 adults. Extra rent and deposit for pets and kids

Available November 1st
