Text2: Senior Living, Pet Friendly 2 bedroom Apartments, Great closets. ( Bat
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Westbrook Place Apartments

We offer some great amenities, and our location can't be beat! We're located across the street from Irving Park, where you can walk the trails, visit the duck pond, or play disc golf! With walking distance of Bronson Battle Creek Hospital, Kellogg Community College, and Battle Creek Central High School. We are also near numerous drug stores, restaurants, and a grocery store.

Westbrook place is an affordable Senior housing community, for individuals 55 years of age and older with utilities included. Residents are responsible for their cable, internet and phone. We are 6 floors tall with 2 elevators, but you can take the stairs if you'd like! We are a pet friendly community with a few exceptions.

A list of community amenities include :

-Door-Side Trash Pick-up - Monday, Wednesday, and Friday
-Community Laundry Facilities - 3 new washers and dryers available for resident use 24 hours
-Hot or cold lunch service delivered to your door for Residents who sign up for it
-Secured entrance - We have a secure entrance so residents can choose who to let into the building

The apartments themselves feature tall ceilings, central Air Conditioning and Heating, and all appliances are included, even microwaves.

If you, or a loved one are looking for a new home, please give us a call!
Let us get you into your new home.

Battle Creek MI 49037

This pet friendly hi-rise building on the lake has been updated with great features including free high-speed internet, fitness room, outdoor lounge spaces with grills and patio furniture, mailroom with package lockers, and secure entry. 
The location is so convenient to the Bryn Mawr Red line, the Lakefront Trail, Kathy Osterman Beach, Edgewater Dog Park, and many restaurants, cafes and grocery stores. Indoor and outdoor parking is available.
The units boast modern kitchens with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, and spacious quartz counter tops.
Living spaces are large and bright with great room sizes!
Please note: pricing is dynamic and subject to change based on floor height, move-in date and length of lease.

Utilities including heat, water and internet are part of a monthly package, $75 a month for studios.
Electric (lights, appliances, air conditioning) are separate.
Pets are welcome, no dogs over 60 lbs. Pet fees and pet rent apply. 
Video available.

Text2: Studio at the beach, Park & Lakefront $955.00
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
STUDIO AVAILABLE FOR ONE OCCUPANT. NO ROOMMATES.  All new kitchen area. 

Live on the lakefront at Pratt Beach in a 1st Floor Studio with Full Bath. You’ll be right on the lakefront and beach for the sunrise over Lake Michigan every day . Only three other units on same floor. Two large closets. Quiet, vintage building. North facing windows. Lots of light for a Northern exposure. Beautiful all new paint and this unit has a brand new kitchen with new cabinets, new refrigerator and stove. Also lovely all oak floors. Walk to Loyola U campus; easy ride to Northwestern. 

SMOKE FREE PROPERTY. NO PETS ACCEPTED. Unit includes locked storage area in the building and coin laundry. Extremely quiet building. If you are seeking quiet and have a very quiet lifestyle this unit may be a good fit for you. Mostly long-term tenants in building. Only one tenant per studio (No roommates) low tenant density.

Our building is THE closest you can get to Pratt Beach! Easy walk to Starbucks, 7–11, Blaze Pizza, Chipotle, Raising Canes. Argo Tea, Bop-N-Grill, New 400 Movie Theater, Loyola Red Line stop and Northwestern Shuttle. Peaceful building and kind neighbors - beautiful neighborhood. "Quality of Life" spot. Zoned parking.

The beach, lakefront, gorgeous sunrise and tennis courts are literally steps from your front door. Heat is included in rent; tenants pay electricity and cooking gas. One year lease minimum. $550 non-refundable move-in fee. NO security deposit. $65. to apply; we do credit and background checks.

Call 872-806-2088 to make appointment to see this wonderful apartment/home on the lakefront.

NO PETS and ABSOLUTELY NO SMOKING ON PROPERTY

Welcome to Harbor Pointe Apartments, a great place to call home. Our quiet community is nestled on the shores of scenic Granville Lake just minutes from the Brown Deer and Bayshore shopping districts. Our pet-friendly community is an ideal setting to call home. We offer a full range of Studio, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartment homes to fit your unique needs. Choose our classic Milwaukee apartments or a townhome with a private entry and garage. Regardless of your needs, our dedicated leasing staff is eager to assist you and show you a better style of living! Living at Harbor Pointe is like condo living without any of the hassles. Our 24-hour emergency maintenance is on call waiting to assist you. The community grounds are professionally maintained. Take a walk through our lush, manicured grounds along our paved jogging paths and enjoy the beauty of nature within the metro area. Hop in our heated indoor pool and take a few laps, or simply let our whirlpool's jets massage away the strain of the workout you'll get in our 2 fully equipped fitness rooms! Enjoy entertainment options that include, American Family Field, The Milwaukee Art Museum, and Downtown Milwaukee with all the best attractions of a big city just a short drive away. Local restaurants include Cafe Hollander, Libby Montana Bar & Grill, and Rocky Rococo. Our leasing professionals look forward to scheduling your personalized tour of your new home and showing you how we are making Harbor Pointe the place to live.

Text2: Amazing 3BR/3.5BA Condo in Brighton - Available NOW!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
End unit 3BR/3.5BA townhome style condo that's been completely updated throughout. Located near an all-sports lake (with access), this amazing home features over 2,100/sf of finished living area and is located convenient to freeways (23 & 96), yet tucked away on a street with no pass through traffic. Nothing but woods to see from windows out back. Includes a one car attached garage with fresh paint and shelving.

Kitchen has been fully updated with new easy-close cabinets, granite countertops, undermount sink, tile backsplash, faucet and fingerprint-proof SS appliances with gas stove! First floor laundry room features both washer and dryer (provided). Cozy up around the gas fireplace in the living room which looks out onto a private deck and woods out back. Programmable Nest thermostat for convenience.

2nd floor boasts a wonderful master bedroom ensuite with vaulted ceiling, new flooring, dual closets and primary bath containing dual sinks, jetted tub and separate shower. Guest bedroom is ensuite with vaulted ceiling, updated flooring and full bath that's been recently remodeled.

Large finished area in basement can be used either as an ensuite bedroom with full bath or as a family/recreation room. Also includes water softener, RO water filtration and whole house humidifier.

Forget about mowing grass or shoveling snow! Water, sewer and garbage pickup is included, tenant pays all other utilities. Landlord pays HOA fee. 5585 Woodruff Shore Dr.

Sorry NO PETS and NO SMOKERS. All applicants must have credit score of 700+ with verifiable sufficient income to afford lease payments and references. $40 (per person) non-refundable application fee to cover full background and credit check.

Nestled in idyllic Rochester Hills, Oaks at Hampton beckons with a glimpse of apartment living as you’ve never imagined. Feel at ease with our highly rated Rochester schools nearby and Troy’s vibrant business and technology corridor five miles away. This room can be used for an office, dog room or even storage!Our kitchens comes with a stove/oven combination, refrigerator, dishwasher and let's not forget about the garbage disposal!

Text2: December Move In Ready!!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
We welcome you and your furry loved ones to come experience life at Aspen Chase, tucked next to a mature tree line which borders The Chippewa Club. You’ll find many pet-friendly conveniences that will make you and your beloved pet feel right at home! Enjoy peaceful walks through our beautifully landscaped community with various courtyards and seasonal flowers throughout. Get to know your neighbors while your furry companion makes some friends at our dog park and your kids play on the playground adjacent to it! Clean-up is a cinch as there are 15 pet stations throughout the property that are regularly stocked by our friendly maintenance staff, along with five picnic/grilling posts in case you’d like to relax and dine outdoors. When you need to stock up on food and litter or drop your furry friend off for a groom and nail trim, Petco is within seven minutes of our community.

You’ll find everything you need to feel right at home in this cozy one-bedroom apartment! Upon entering you’ll be greeted by a well-lit living room which leads to a walk-out patio/balcony that easily accommodates an outdoor, bistro patio set as well as small potted plants. Opposite the living room is the dining area along with a wall-to-wall closet featuring built-in shelving, use it for coats and storage or organize it with supplies and totes. Next to the dining area you’ll find your galley style kitchen complete with all appliances (dishwasher, garbage disposal, electric stove, and refrigerator). As you head down the hallway to one side is your full-size bathroom including a linen closet with deep shelving. The other side is your comfy bedroom showcasing another wall-to-wall closet that will easily fit any mattress size with accompanying furniture.

Maintaining a pristine community for your enjoyment is our priority here at Aspen Chase. Our pet policy allows:

· Any size cat or dog

· Two pets/apartment

Our application and electronic lease signing processes are simple and quick!

· Electronic lease signing option via DocuSign

Text2: Great 2 BR Apt
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Beautiful 2 BR first floor apt, big living room with a built-in air conditioner, re-decorated eat-in kitchen with refrigerator, stove and lots of cabinet space. Both bedrooms have double closets and hardwood floors. There is one assigned parking space included, shared porches and a storage locker and laundry in the basement. Close to Wauwatosa, major bus lines and easy access to downtown. Building has a history of good long-term tenants. Security deposit is $725. Available between Nov. 15 and Dec. 1st. Pictures are not the actual apt that will be available but are very similar to it. The biggest difference is the color of the appliances, instead of white, the stove is black and the refrigerator is stainless steel.

During the worst of COVID-19, I started doing pre-screening and private showings to limit everyone's exposure to it. I found this approach to be more effective and efficient than my old method of having an "open house" so I have decided to continue it even though COVID-19 is less of and issue than it was then. If you are reading this ad, the apt is still available. 
Please reply by email if you have more questions or are interested in providing the information I need to pre-screen. If you prefer to discuss the apt by phone you can call Jerry at 262-789-86twotwo, however, all pre-screen info needs to be given via email.

Info needed for pre-screen (you can copy this, hit "reply" above the ad title, then paste and fill it out in your email reply, please provide the info for each adult who will be residing at apt):

-Full name and birth date of each adult who will be residing at apt ________________________
-Name(s) and age(s) of child(ren) that will be living with you____________________________
-Current address________________________How long?_________Your phone #_____________
-Landlord name and contact info_________________________________________
-Current Employer_______________Starting date_______Gross Monthly Income______
Employer Address and Phone #___________________________ Job Title____________
-Additional Monthly income and source___________________________________

After doing the pre-screening I will contact the applicants who are likely to be approved to schedule a private showing.

Some of the Qualifications:
*Must be 18 years or over
*Must have at least $2200/Mo in verifiable household gross income
*Bring Photo ID to showing, also having proof of income at that time will expedite an application
*Be able to get WE Energies in your name
*Able to pay FULL Security deposit within a day of application approval
*No evictions in past 10 yrs.

Property is owned by a WI Licensed Real Estate Broker

Text2: The Vineyard Manor House at Freedom Run Winery
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This house was built in 1826 with stone from the Erie Canal and has been restored to its original grandeur. It is available for short term, furnished rental for up to 12 months. Would consider shorter or longer term. At the present time it is available through Airbnb. com /h/vineyard manor house (no spaces).

It is located on the grounds of Freedom Run Winery on the Niagara Wine Trail in Lockport, NY which has been a family owned and operated business since 2005. If you are looking for a house with charm and like the idea of it being located on a working vineyard...please contact us.

The decor is ‘shabby chic’ yet elegant and comfy. The Grand Foyer entrance offers a flow through plan around a wooden Curved Staircase.

The ground floor space includes Living Room, Formal Dining Room, Eat-in Kitchen & Ground floor Library, which has been converted to a Bedroom. There is a ground floor Powder Room, and Mud Room leading to the BBQ area in the Back Yard, and there is a 1 car detached Garage.

There are 1 second floor bedrooms including a Master Bedroom with Ensuite Shower/Steam Bathroom, and 2 additional Bedrooms and a Full Bathroom in the hall.

Text2: Exceptional lower duplex, added office/den Save $100 p/m
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Find Your Best Nest Here.
Please READ the entire post prior to inquiry, it offers a lot of information. 

Good Credit Required but GREAT CREDIT earns you $100.00 off per month on a 12 month lease making rent $1895.00. 

Exceptional and Unique Lower 2 bedroom with office/den space in lower duplex.
Located in Milwaukee’s Washington Heights Neighborhood at the edge of Wauwatosa. A quiet place to call home in a great neighborhood setting. Near Vliet Street and it's special eats and drinks and not far from North Avenue Venues. Minutes from Medical College, a quick commute to downtown, UWM, MSOE, or Brookfield.

Built in 1918, this space has all the fabulous features of its original builder with updates that bring in its functionality of today. The property offers many features not found in the usual duplex setting, 9 ft plus ceilings, architectural columns, private and separate front entrance for this unit with lovely sitting porch. A rare opportunity to live in such a wonderful home.

Kitchen offers a large space with a tremendous quartz island that wows the eye! Coffee bar too. Hardwood floors, tile backsplash, floating shelves, and pantry. Appliances include Stove, Refrigerator, Dishwasher.

Dining room, ideal for entertaining, is large and features built in leaded glass buffet of the period

Living room entrance enhanced with architectural columns and large windows with wide windowsills. One window oversees the fabulous front porch.

Master bedroom spacious with walk in closet, upper focal ledge and close to the main bath.

Back bedroom nice size and oversees the large backyard.

Front room/office with large windows oversees the front porch great space for studio, office, play room for the kids, spare bedroom for visitors.

Entrance Front Porch has lots of space for outdoor entertaining as well as private nights together. Find yourself enjoying the great outdoors with enough space for an outdoor sofa on one side and a dining table on the other. Enough room for plants as well!

PLEASE NOTE: Good Credit REQUIRED. We do a thorough Background check on ALL applicants to include "CREDIT" and criminal. We cannot accept eviction, bankruptcy, foreclosure or other poor financial history. Square footage is approximate and not guaranteed.

Flexible move date Available as early as December 1st 2022 
We offer a term lease and in many cases to renew in a better time of year. Term lease through April of 2024 preferred. We do not offer month to month and we DO renew yearly.

NON-Smoking (NO VAPING) Premise, NO exceptions.
All tenants must provide their own renter's insurance upon move in.

Washer and Dryer at basement level with plenty of basement storage space. An additional 1/2 bath at basement level.

One garage space with garage door opener and one outdoor space infront of garage as well. Large backyard with flower gardening possible.

Tenants share in snow removal, mowing, salting, and garbage and recycling carts. 

Responsible pet parents with well behaved pet considered. PLEASE NOTE: requests of multiple pets will result in an additional monthly fee. In some cases, an added security deposit may be required.

Rent of $1995.00. Security the same as rent and due at time of acceptance/lease signing. Utility costs (We Energy) are tenant's financial responsibility, sewer/water is included in the rent. We do not allow any type of Dish be placed on any part of the building(s) structure. No TV mounts.

We do not offer open house dates but will schedule appointments. We prefer to offer independent time for questions, conversation, and to browse.

Located on 59th near Washington Blvd. at the edge of Wauwatosa.

SERIOUS Inquiries call to schedule a showing appointment. This allows me to answer any other questions you have. I DO NOT schedule appointments (via text) without talking to you on the phone.  

I no longer offer the address for your protection and mine, I do not live out of town, out of the country, and will never ask you for money to have keys sent without showing you the property. I live in the area and have been here for more than 30 years.

If the above fits your budget, is the size you need and the area you'd like to live, you will not be disappointed. This is not the typical duplex unit.

Text2: Great 2 BR Apt
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Beautiful 2 BR first floor apt, big living room with a built-in air conditioner, re-decorated eat-in kitchen with refrigerator, stove and lots of cabinet space. Both bedrooms have double closets and hardwood floors. There is one assigned parking space included, shared porches and a storage locker and laundry in the basement. Close to Wauwatosa, major bus lines and easy access to downtown. Building has a history of good long-term tenants. Security deposit is $725. Available between Nov. 15 and Dec. 1st. Pictures are not the actual apt that will be available but are very similar to it. The biggest difference is the color of the appliances, instead of white, the stove is black and the refrigerator is stainless steel.

During the worst of COVID-19, I started doing pre-screening and private showings to limit everyone's exposure to it. I found this approach to be more effective and efficient than my old method of having an "open house" so I have decided to continue it even though COVID-19 is less of and issue than it was then. If you are reading this ad, the apt is still available. 
Please reply by email if you have more questions or are interested in providing the information I need to pre-screen. If you prefer to discuss the apt by phone you can call Jerry at 262-789-86twotwo, however, all pre-screen info needs to be given via email.

Info needed for pre-screen (you can copy this, hit "reply" above the ad title, then paste and fill it out in your email reply, please provide the info for each adult who will be residing at apt):

-Full name and birth date of each adult who will be residing at apt ________________________
-Name(s) and age(s) of child(ren) that will be living with you____________________________
-Current address________________________How long?_________Your phone #_____________
-Landlord name and contact info_________________________________________
-Current Employer_______________Starting date_______Gross Monthly Income______
Employer Address and Phone #___________________________ Job Title____________
-Additional Monthly income and source___________________________________

After doing the pre-screening I will contact the applicants who are likely to be approved to schedule a private showing.

Some of the Qualifications:
*Must be 18 years or over
*Must have at least $2200/Mo in verifiable household gross income
*Bring Photo ID to showing, also having proof of income at that time will expedite an application
*Be able to get WE Energies in your name
*Able to pay FULL Security deposit within a day of application approval
*No evictions in past 10 yrs.

Property is owned by a WI Licensed Real Estate Broker

Text2: One of a kind carriage house apartment - privacy and natural light (1 bed/1 bath
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Now available, a unique 1 bedroom apartment with no neighbors - it’s the second floor of a century old carriage house (first floor is storage/laundry — a garage too small for most cars). 

Lots of natural light — tall windows on 3 sides of the unit. 
Privacy — the only buildings within 50 feet of you are garages, and the apartment is upstairs. 
Time saving - It’s a compact 400sf unit with ceramic tile in one half and bamboo laminate flooring in the rest. Easy to keep clean and allergy-friendly. 
Laundry at home — modern high efficiency washer and dryer installed within the last few years.
New refrigerator with built-in icemaker. 
Gas stove, microwave, and blender 
Air conditioned in summer.  

Free high speed wireless Internet. 
Water/sewer/trash included in rent — electricity and gas will be paid by tenant.  

Tenant must carry and maintain renter’s insurance.

Located two blocks from the river walk. Easy walk to Leeper Park. Less than a block to The Local Cup cafe. 

Credit and background check required — you’ll pay $30 to Rentspree for that.

1 year minimum lease. 
$500 security deposit
$600 per month
Pets will be considered on a case by case basis and will require additional deposit and fees.


The attached images are a bit dated — refrigerator and heating unit have both been replaced since they were taken. Please keep in mind that they are very wide angle photos to show the layout and appearance efficiently,  and (like almost all real estate photos) make the apartment look quite large. It is only 20 feet by 20 feet.  Cozy, not spacious. I have some current photos of the apartment empty available on request.

Note that the lower level (which is also about 400sf) is available for storage (we also store some things there) and use as additional space. The washer and dryer and water heater are located there. I’ve had tenants turn it into a study space.  The enclosed staircase and landing have also been used for that purpose during warmer weather, and offer additional storage space for items that are not sensitive to temperature changes. Both of these help to free up living space. 

The air conditioning unit is a portable AC (that is, a largish wheeled unit with a couple flexible hoses attached to an insulated panel that fits in a window. In winter, it is generally stored in the staircase closet space.

Hi! 
 
My name is Sydney and I would love to help you with the application process to get you moved in as soon as we can! To get started, If you click on the name of the properties it will take you to our apartments.com page with virtual tours. 
 
Listed below are the current prices for both of our properties and highlighted the units we have coming available! 
 
Westminster Park:
•	1 bedroom, 1 bath apt. home- $950.00 - AVAILABLE 
•	2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1100 - AVAILABLE 
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome - $1295
 
Heritage Glen:
•	1 bedroom, 1 bath townhome- $1025 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1150.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1275.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1375.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
 
Gas, heat, and water are included in your monthly so you are only responsible for your DTE and any kind of cable, internet or streaming services you decide to get.  
 
Qualifications:
To qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3 times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior monies owed to previous landlords; and we will do a criminal background check as well.
 
What to Bring When You Apply:
- 4 most recent paystubs for each leaseholder
- a copy of your social security card and ID (we need this for each person over 18)
- 2 Money orders
        - One for the application fee, this is $50.00 per adult (this is     
           nonrefundable)
        - One for $50 for the reservation fee (this is returned if you are denied,
            if approved it goes towards your security deposit) 

If you have any questions, we are here Mon-Fri from 9a- 6p and Sat. from 9am-4pm. Due to Covid-19, please use our phone number and email for communication.

Taylor, MI 48180

BRAND NEW COMMUNITY CENTER featuring an expansive Social Gathering Room, fitness center with state-of-the art fitness equipment and flat screen televisions and a beautifully designed outdoor swimming pool. At Lexington Village Apartments you’ll find so much more than a place to call home. It begins with a walk around our beautifully landscaped grounds. The brick-faced buildings and lush green grassy areas are the perfect place to relax with your favorite four-legged friend. In addition to being close to a dog park, Lexington Village Apartments is also one of the few communities with a pet friendly policy.Better still is our location. Within walking distance of the Oakland Mall and close to downtown Royal Oak, our residents are close to great shopping, dining options and entertainment, while still enjoying the serenity of our neighborhood. Easy access to I-75 and I-696 allow neighbors an easy way to get anywhere within the city.We encourage you to visit and see for yourself just how much Lexington Village Apartments has to offer, including our unique 24-hour service guarantee. Call to set up a private tour today! Pet Policy Lexington Village Apartments offers pet friendly apartments in Madison Heights and welcomes both cats and dogs. You'll find beautiful green spaces where your dog can run and play. In addition, your dog can run free and meet new friends at the nearby Red Oak Dog Park.We are one of the few communities in the area to welcome your large dog! We have a limit of 2 pets under 25 lbs each or one large pet without a weight limit. Some breed restrictions apply. We're confident your pet will love living at Lexington Village Apartments as much as our human neighbors do! Gas, heat, and water included in your rent, so you are only responsible for your DTE and any kind of cable, internet or streaming services you decide to get.

Qualifications: To qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3 times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior monies owed to previous landlords; and we will do a background check as well.
What to bring when you apply; 4 recent paystubs; a copy of social security card and ID (needed for each person over 18)
2 Money orders One for the application fee, this $50.00 per adult (this is nonrefundable) One for $50 for the registration fee (this is returned if you are denied, if approved it goes towards your security deposit)
If you have any questions, we are here Mon-Fri 9a-6p and Sat 9a-4p. Due to Covid-19, please use our number and email for communication.

The location is great, too... close to Kwik Trip, Pick'n Save and Festival grocery stores, minutes from downtown Appleton, and around the corner from Hwy 441.  Here are more highlights:

-Heat and water included

-Abundant closet space 
-Intercom system

-Private patio
-On-site coin operated laundry facility
-Secured/locked building entry doors
-Assigned parking 
-Professional lawn care and snow plowing services
-Fast and friendly 24 hour on-call maintenance
-Locally owned and managed

Text2: Holiday Special - 1 Month Free on an 18th Month Lease - Pilsen 3 Bed
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
BE THE FIRST TO LIVE IN THIS NEWLY RENOVATED APARTMENT *NEW KITCHEN WITH STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES AND TWO NEW BATHROOMS*

WHAT:  Newly Renovated, Bright, Spacious 3-bedroom plus den/office and 2 bath apartment in vintage Pilsen building. Renovations just finished! Updates include: stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, in-unit laundry, granite countertops, gleaming hardwood floors, central heat and air conditioning, and two newly remodeled bathrooms! The bedrooms are huge (twice the size of the typical Pilsen bedroom) and feature great closet space, including two massive walk-in closets in two of the bedrooms. Please note this apartment is on the 4th floor.

WHERE: Located on a prime block of 18th Street - close to everything! Less than 3 blocks to the CTA Pink Line, restaurants, cafes, coffee shops and local boutiques. Easy access to UIC, The Illinois Medical District, Chicago's Loop, the West Loop and Fulton Market.

WHEN: Available December or January at $2,550/month

LEASE TERMS: 6 or 18-month lease. Owner pays for trash, water and sewer. Tenant is responsible for gas and electric. Good credit and verifiable income a must! Minimum credit score of 650 required. One or more owners are licensed IL. real estate brokers with Essex Realty Group, Inc.

- $2,550/Month
- Available December or January 
- No Security Deposit
- One Time $950 Administrative Move-In Fee
- Pets One-Time Non-Refundable Fee of $350 per animal plus $25/month pet rent. (2 cats or 1 dog max)
- Storage Lockers in Basement
- In-Unit Laundry 
- Tenant responsible for Heat, Gas & Electric
- Central Heat + A/C
- Call Today for a Tour, You Won’t be Disappointed!

View Matterport Here: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=HqKbJVKyWaz&brand=0

Hi, my name is Cira, and I would love to help you with the application process to get you moved in as soon as we can! To get started, if you click on the name of the properties, it will take you to our apartments.com page with virtual tours.

 

Listed below are the current prices for both of our properties and highlighted the units we have coming available!

 

Westminster Park:

1 bedroom, 1 bath apt. home- $950.00 - AVAILABLE
2 bedrooms, 1.5 bath townhome- $1100 - AVAILABLE
3 bedrooms, 1.5 bath townhome - $1295- AVAILABLE 

Heritage Glen:

1 bedroom, 1 bath townhome- $1025 - AVAILABLE NOW
2 bedrooms, 1.5 bath townhome- $1150.00 - AVAILABLE NOW
3 bedrooms, 1.5 bath townhome- $1275.00 - AVAILABLE NOW
3 bedrooms, 1.5 bath townhome- $1375.00 - AVAILABLE NOW

Gas, heat, and water are included in your monthly, so you are only responsible for your DTE and any kind of cable, internet or streaming services you decide to get.

 

Qualifications:

To qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3 times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior monies owed to previous landlords; and we will do a criminal background check as well.

 

What to Bring When You Apply:

- 4 most recent paystubs for each leaseholder

- a copy of your social security card and ID (we need this for each person over 18)

- 2 Money orders

- One for the application fee, this is $50.00 per adult (this is

nonrefundable)

- One for $50 for the reservation fee (this is returned if you are denied,

if approved it goes towards your security deposit)


If you have any questions, we are here Mon-Fri from 9a- 6p and Sat. from 9am-4pm. Due to Covid-19, please use our phone number and email for communication.

 

 
Cira Truitt
Leasing Specialist
Heritage Glen Townhomes
9633 East Pickwick Circle
Taylor, MI 48180

3 bedrooms, 1.5 bath townhome- $1375.00 - AVAILABLE NOW

Gas, heat, and water are included in your monthly, so you are only responsible for your DTE and any kind of cable, internet or streaming services you decide to get.

 

Qualifications:

To qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3 times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior monies owed to previous landlords; and we will do a criminal background check as well.

 

What to Bring When You Apply:

- 4 most recent paystubs for each leaseholder

- a copy of your social security card and ID (we need this for each person over 18)

- 2 Money orders

- One for the application fee, this is $50.00 per adult (this is

nonrefundable)

- One for $50 for the reservation fee (this is returned if you are denied,

if approved it goes towards your security deposit)

OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!Surrounded by sprawling green lawns and mature trees, Independence Green Apartments is your destination for inspired living. Our one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartment homes offer well-appointed interiors complete with a convenient in-home washer and dryer and ample storage space.  Our wooded community provides gorgeous views and the perfect backdrop for a quiet glass of wine on your own private patio. If you prefer to work out before you relax, check out our heated indoor pool in the winter, or our sparkling outdoor pool and sand volleyball court in the summer.    Independence Green Apartments has everything you need to unwind, get fit, and live well. Heritage Glen 1 Bedroom 1 Bath townhome $1025 AVAILABLE OCTOBER
2 Bedroom 1.5 Bath townhome $1150 AVAILABLE OCTOBER
3 Bedroom 1.5 Bath townhome $1275 AVAILABLE OCTOBER

Gas, heat, and water included in your rent, so you are only responsible for your DTE and any kind of cable, internet or streaming services you decide to get.

2 Money orders One for the application fee, this $50.00 per adult (this is nonrefundable) One for $50 for the registration fee (this is returned if you are denied, if approved it goes towards your security deposit)
If you have any questions, we are here Mon-Fri 9a-6p and Sat 9a-4p. Due to Covid-19, please use our number and email for communication.

Text2: Sports Court, Private Entrance, BBQ & Picnic Area
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Come home to Water's Edge and relax in our newly renovated community surrounded by mature shade trees, lush landscaping and a beautiful tranquil pond. Water's Edge features one- and two-bedroom apartment homes with a private entrance, air conditioning, spacious closets and so much more. Renovated homes include brand new flooring, energy-efficient kitchen appliances, maple cabinetry and faux granite countertops. Spend the summer months relaxing by the sparkling swimming pool, walking nearby nature trails, fishing in our private lake or reading under one of the shade trees. With easy access to I-96, you are conveniently located near the attractions of Ann Arbor, Novi, South Lyon and Detroit. Join in the fun at nearby Kensington Lake and Park, Riverbank Golf Course or Twelve Oaks Mall... there is something for everyone to enjoy at Water's Edge.

-Late Fee Forgiveness
-Dining Room
-Linen Closet
-Central Air Conditioning
-Community Gardens
-Two Bark Parks
-Laundry Facility
-Cash Payments Accepted At Select Retailers

-Fitness Center
-Dishwasher

Text2: Beautiful 1 Bedroom apartment available in Ann Arbor!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
*Offering Virtual and In Person Tours*

Evergreen is a beautifully landscaped & well-maintained community on the Eastside of Ann Arbor. Conveniently located on Packard just East of Carpenter with access to AATA Route #5, only one mile from US-23; within walking distance of many shops and restaurants in Ann Arbor!


1bd x 1ba – 648 Sq. Ft. THE CARPENTER

This spacious 1 bedroom will fit all your large furniture! The dining room fits a six-person table top, the living room comfortably fits a couch, chair and desk or a large sectional couch and entertainment center! The closet space is over-the-top and will help you stay tidy and organized. There is a coat closet, a linen closet, a storage closet, a kitchen pantry and a wall to wall bedroom closet! The bedroom is big enough to fit an entire queen bedroom set or king size bed, nightstand and dresser. The walk-in kitchen is fully equipped with a dishwasher (in select homes), stove, & refrigerator! All rooms have overhead lighting for your convenience.


Evergreen Apartment Homes are in the exceptional Ann Arbor Public Schools district, where students attend the following schools: * Carpenter Elementary School * Scarlett Middle School * Huron High School

Visit our website here: https://www.mckinley.com/apartments/michigan/ann-arbor/evergreen-apartments

Text2: Furry Friends Welcome! Cats & Dogs! Up to 2 Pets per !! Reserve Today!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Offering Virtual and In-Person Tours

Bring your furry friend on a tour of the community or just drop in for a treat! You can have up to two pets in your home including cats, dogs or one of each (breed restrictions only). There is a one-time pet fee due of $300/$500 and the monthly pet rent is $30 and covers up to two pets.

You will have access to several outdoor pet stations, great for easy clean up. There is a lot of space outdoors within the community to take your pet for a walk, and a leash free dog park just a short 10-minute drive away to let your pup run free!

1bd x 1ba – 648 Sq. Ft. THE CARPENTER

Stay organized and clutter-free in your one bedroom apartment home featuring four closets throughout!

· A Kitchen Pantry, Fits Brooms and Vacuum

· A Linen Closet with Built-In Shelving for Additional Storage

1 bedroom, 1 bath townhome - $1025.00

Application fees are $50.00 per adult.  We also collect $50.00 deposit with the application.

.

First applied, first served, with security deposit in, if you are serious about moving into a townhome, now is the time to apply.
 
Thank you,

Taylor, MI 48180

  Description
  
    Welcome to Bay Park Apartments! Located within walking distance to many of the areas local entertainment, restaurants and shopping centers; this 1 bedroom apartment comes with convenience and new updates. All apartments at Bay Park Apartments include a 1-stall garage and an additional assigned outdoor parking space. Heat, parking and water are all included, laundry is available in the building, Enjoy the summer with your own patio with a sliding glass door. Sorry, no pets are allowed at this property.

Hi! 
 
My name is Sydney and I would love to help you with the application process to get you moved in as soon as we can! To get started, If you click on the name of the properties it will take you to our apartments.com page with virtual tours. 
 
Listed below are the current prices for both of our properties and highlighted the units we have coming available! 
 
Westminster Park:
•	1 bedroom, 1 bath apt. home- $950.00 - AVAILABLE 
•	2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1100 - AVAILABLE 
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome - $1295
 
Heritage Glen:
•	1 bedroom, 1 bath townhome- $1025 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1150.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1275.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1375.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
 
Gas, heat, and water are included in your monthly so you are only responsible for your DTE and any kind of cable, internet or streaming services you decide to get.  
 
Qualifications:
To qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3 times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior monies owed to previous landlords; and we will do a criminal background check as well.

Hi! 
 
My name is Sydney and I would love to help you with the application process to get you moved in as soon as we can! To get started, If you click on the name of the properties it will take you to our apartments.com page with virtual tours. 
 
Listed below are the current prices for both of our properties and highlighted the units we have coming available! 
 
Westminster Park:
•	1 bedroom, 1 bath apt. home- $950.00 - AVAILABLE 
•	2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1100 - AVAILABLE 
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome - $1295
 
Heritage Glen:
•	1 bedroom, 1 bath townhome- $1025 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1150.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1275.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
•	3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1375.00 - AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER
 
Gas, heat, and water are included in your monthly so you are only responsible for your DTE and any kind of cable, internet or streaming services you decide to get.  
 
Qualifications:
To qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3 times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior monies owed to previous landlords; and we will do a criminal background check as well.
 
What to Bring When You Apply:
- 4 most recent paystubs for each leaseholder
- a copy of your social security card and ID (we need this for each person over 18)
- 2 Money orders
        - One for the application fee, this is $50.00 per adult (this is     
           nonrefundable)
        - One for $50 for the reservation fee (this is returned if you are denied,
            if approved it goes towards your security deposit) 

If you have any questions, we are here Mon-Fri from 9a- 6p and Sat. from 9am-4pm. Due to Covid-19, please use our phone number and email for communication.

Taylor, MI 48180

Westminster Park:
1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment home - $950.00
2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome - $1100.00
3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome - $1295.00
 
Heritage Glen:
1 bedroom, 1 bath townhome - $1025.00
2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome - $1150.00
3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome -  $1275.00  to $1375.00
 
Gas, heat, water, sewer, and trash are included!!
 
In order to qualify for a home, you will need to show that you gross a minimum of 3x's the monthly rent; have more positive credit than negative; no prior evictions or monies owed to prior landlord; we will process a background screen. Application fees are $50.00 per adult.  We also collect $50.00 deposit with the application.

Text2: Beautiful Communities Amazing Neighbors, RESERVE TODAY!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Just steps outside your door, enjoy the beautiful grounds at Schooner Cove! In a parklike setting, your home is surrounded by courtyards, lush wooded areas, floral landscaping, walking trails, lakeside grilling, picnic spots & more!

On hot days, enjoy sunbathing at the sundeck or swim overlooking picturesque Ford Lake. Play a tennis match, a game of volleyball or enjoy fun times at the kid’s play yard all located within your community at Schooner Cove!

Next door at Ford Lake Park are even more amenities to enjoy! With 98 acres, the park has plenty of amenities for your enjoyment. Launch your kayak or canoe, workout in our 24/7 fitness center, go fishing, relax at the beach area, play a game of horseshoes, racquetball or basketball with friends!

1x1 – 792 Sq. Ft. THE HURON  (upper floors have an additional storage closet)

Enter your home through a private outside entry door! Your living room will fit large furniture & the kitchen is open with a breakfast bar with a place for bar stools, both great for entertaining! The kitchen is fully equipped with a pantry, gas stove (great for cooking!), refrigerator, dishwasher and disposal. Enjoy the convenience and privacy of having your own washer and dryer which will also save you time and money! Your spacious bedroom will fit a king size bed, a dresser and nightstand. To help you stay organized, there are additional storage and walk-in closets in the bedroom and an entry closet!

Our application and electronic lease signing processes are simple and quick!

Text2: Convenient Services Available from the Comfort of Your Home!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Offering Virtual and In-Person Tours
Located in a beautiful lakeside community on the southern banks of Ford Lake, Schooner Cove is situated in a residential neighborhood next to Ford Lake Park & just 10 minutes from Depot Town, Downtown Ypsilanti, Wizard’s Apple Orchard & Rolling Hills Park.

EMU, St. Joe’s & WCC are approximately a 15-minute drive from home, while The University of Michigan and Downtown Ann Arbor are a 20-minute commute. You will have I-94 access at Huron Street towards Ann Arbor or Rawsonville Road towards Metro Detroit.

At almost 1000 square feet, this two- bedroom is the perfect layout for fitting large furniture, entertaining guests, relaxing, recharging, & staying organized!

Walk into an open, large great area which fits a four-person dinner table, a large sectional couch and a floor to ceiling entertainment center. Sliding glass doors lead to the most unique feature of this home, an enclosed sunroom balcony, to enjoy year-round! Bring the outdoors in when you choose but keep bugs & cold weather out. Control your own thermostat & stay comfortable with central air conditioning and heat.

The kitchen has a ton of cabinet space that will fit all your cookware & pantry items! It fits a small bistro table or storage cart & is fully equipped with a dishwasher, refrigerator, stove and garbage disposal.

Your king size furniture will fit in the master bedroom and includes a walk-in closet, making it easy to keep this room tidy! A well-lit vanity space has a separate bathroom entrance, both features making for a convenient morning routine! Perfect when roommates need to get ready at the same time. The 2nd bedroom has a wall-to-wall reach-in closet and will fit a queen bed and tall dresser.

Stay clutter-free throughout your entire home with ton of extra storage room including a shelved entry, linen and hallway closets that fits bins or tall items like a broom or vacuum. (Extra Storage in Building!). The bathroom has a medicine cabinet for extra storage and tub/shower combo for relaxing and recharging.

Our application and electronic lease signing processes are simple and quick!

· Call Eddie at  show contact info
 to get more details · Submit your on-line application at: www.mckinley.com/schooner-cove

· Electronic lease signing option via DocuSign

Equal Housing Opportunity

Text2: Taking A Limited # Of Reservations - 3 BRs for 2023 – Private Laundry!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Schooner Cove Apartments, located in Ypsilanti, Michigan, are set on the banks of beautiful Ford Lake. We offer spacious studio, one, two and three bedroom apartment homes. As a resident in our community you will enjoy scenic lakeside living. Enjoy the view from our signature sunrooms, patios or balconies.

Indulge in a lakeside BBQ picnic, relax by the pool, challenge friends to a tennis or volleyball match, all while still at home! We take pride in our community and want you to enjoy all aspects of your home, including 24-hour emergency maintenance services.

Schooner Cove is home to a vast blend of community features, designed for your convenience at affordable rates. All apartments are equipped with an intercom entry system, fully stocked kitchens, additional storage in your apartment, and tons of closet space with built in shelving.

We offer built in bedroom vanities and walk in closets in select apartments.

This Ypsilanti Apartment community is in the exceptional Lincoln Consolidated School District where students attend the following schools:

Lincoln Brick Elementary School
Lincoln Middle School
Lincoln Senior High School

Reserve your home for 2023 and enjoy many benefits!

· Lock in Your Rate!

· Best Price Guarantee!

· Best Choice of Availability Including Floor Plan, Level, View, & Location Within Community!

· Playground & Fitness Center!

3x2 – 1187 Sq. Ft. THE GREAT SALT - (upper floors have an additional storage closet)

Nothing more secluded than private entry! Enjoy the convenience of having two full baths and a full-size washer and dryer right inside your home! Just past the entry closet is the living space, which will comfortably fit large living room furniture, a dining table and two bar stools at the built-in breakfast bar. The kitchen is open to the living space and comes fully equipped with a pantry, gas stove (great for the chef in you!), refrigerator, dishwasher and disposal. Your master bedroom will fit a king size bedroom set. There is a linen closet outside the hallway bathroom.

Text2: 2 bed /1 bath multiple walk in closets, balcony, move in This December
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
We gladly offer virtual and in-person tours

Call today to secure your beautiful top floor two bedroom for a move in before the cold weather settles in. You can reserve this home as soon as today, which locks in the current, discounted price! Call today to learn more and secure your new home! 

880 Sq. Ft. THE BRIGHTMOOR, Our very spacious two-bedroom, features:
· Large Entry Coat Closet
· Dining Area to Fit Four-Person Table Top
· Great Area to Fit Large Couches/Sectionals
· Walk Out Patio/Balcony
· Galley Style Kitchen
· Walk-In Bonus Storage Closet
· Master with Walk-In Closet
· Separate Vanity Area with Double Sinks
Due to the fantastic, central location of The Villas Apartments, you will have numerous transportation options. Walk, bike, bus or drive around town!

Situated on the border of Ann Arbor and Ypsilanti, St. Joe’s, WCC, Fresh Thyme Farmers Market, Happy’s Pizza, & At Home are within walking distance.

There is free parking onsite and it takes only 10 minutes to drive to EMU, Gallup Park, Arbor Land, Target, Meijer or Depot Town. Downtown Ann Arbor, Briarwood Mall & U of M are all within 20 minutes from home!

If you prefer public transportation, AAATA Routes 4 & 24 are just steps from your front door. The Villas Apartments are in the Ypsilanti Community Schools district where and students attend the following Ypsilanti schools: * Perry Early Learning Center * Ypsilanti International Elementary School * Estabrook Elementary School * Ypsilanti Community Middle School * Ypsilanti Community High Schools

Our application and electronic lease signing processes are simple and quick!

· Electronic lease signing option via DocuSign
